['Knowledge of common data design patterns. ', 'Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems. ', ' ', 'To keep pace with our explosive growth, we are currently seeking a data engineer to extend our data collection, warehousing, and analysis capabilities. You’ll use your skills to facilitate objectives ranging from simple data pipelining and summarization for use in internal dashboards, to supporting our prediction initiatives by collecting and transforming data from a variety of sources and then crafting prediction algorithms to run at scale. As such, you’ll need to bring a variety of skills to bear, from pipelining to ETL to algorithmic manipulation of data.Playwire’s services are responsible for delivering millions of ads daily to sites and apps that depend on our technology and expertise for their ad revenue. Data is central to our latest advances in this regard; if you want to participate in the early expansion of our data-related capabilities, and thrive in a fast-paced, rapid-development environment, then talk to us. ', 'An understanding of source control, particularly git and Github. ', 'Knowledge of machine learning principles and technologies. ', 'Knowledge of business intelligence tools, and the relationship between data and BI-type instrumentation. ', 'Help maintain data-related code and service quality, organization, and reliability. ', 'Experience with digital ad servers, SSPs, or ad exchanges. ', 'This position requires full-time employment; availability at our main office in Boca Raton, FL is preferred, but remote work is a possibility. ', 'A basic knowledge of CDNs and the role they fill, including edge computing capabilities.', 'Experience with ETL. ', 'Architect and maintain data pipelines, data lakes, and databases, both independently and as part of a data engineering team. ', 'Experience with Amazon AWS’s data-related services. ', 'Playwire Media is a full-service digital innovation partner that leverages online advertising and proprietary technologies to build publishing brands in the gaming and entertainment verticals. ', 'Design and deploy algorithms best suited for Playwire’s optimization and prediction needs. ', 'Experience working in a team using Agile development and project management practices. ', 'Comfort with big data principles and management. ', 'Proficiency with one or more coding languages; Ruby, Go, and Javascript are all plusses. ', 'Essential functions: ', 'Do you want to get a foot in the door at an online Advertising and Media company that has seen tremendous growth? Do you want to work in the world of online video; one of the fastest growing advertising formats in the world? Then Playwire is the place for you… ', 'Integrate data from external sources, gathered both via API and from email-based reports. ', 'Experience with data pipelining. ', 'Nice-to-haves: ', 'Required qualifications: ', 'Experience with Amazon AWS, particularly RDS and S3. ', 'Experience with digital advertising units, terminology and standards. ', 'Work with the development team to support data-centric applications. ', 'Experience using APIs to access data. ']

', 'You thrive on mapping and designing ingestion and transformation of data from multiple sources, creating a cohesive data asset.', 'You have experience working in health care, life sciences, and/or with scientific data.', 'You have a curious mind, constantly looking into novel approaches for the organization of complex life scientific data, e.g. FHIR for clinical data.', 'Job Code: ', 'You are fluent in SQL and at least one scripting language. Preferably, you have experience in Spark/Scala, too.', 'You are an expert in cloud data warehousing tools (eg BigQuery, Snowflake) and ELT tools (eg Stitch, Fivetran, DBT). You thrive on building modern, cloud-native data pipelines and operations, with an ELT philosophy.', 'You intuitively think of how to organize, normalize, and store complex data, enabling both ETL and end users.', "The Impact You'll Have", 'ad hoc', 'EQRx is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'You have 5+ years of data engineering experience in industry or equivalent.You have experience working in health care, life sciences, and/or with scientific data.You are fluent in SQL and at least one scripting language. Preferably, you have experience in Spark/Scala, too.You intuitively think of how to organize, normalize, and store complex data, enabling both ETL and end users.You have a curious mind, constantly looking into novel approaches for the organization of complex life scientific data, e.g. FHIR for clinical data.You thrive on mapping and designing ingestion and transformation of data from multiple sources, creating a cohesive data asset.You are an expert in cloud data warehousing tools (eg BigQuery, Snowflake) and ELT tools (eg Stitch, Fivetran, DBT). You thrive on building modern, cloud-native data pipelines and operations, with an ELT philosophy.You are an excellent communicator, empathetic with end users and internal customers. Job Code: ', 'Your Superpowers', 'This role will help build a novel model of life sciences company, where data is stored and integrated across functions, informing every process from the beginning. You will speed the development and trialing of novel medicines by bringing a digital and data native technology stack to drug development. You will connect and integrate data sources that map the complex web of interrelationships that bring drugs to patients and empower experts to explore them. You will enable experts across EQRx to see further, connecting data from biology and chemistry, to the clinic and patients, to drug pricing and delivery, powering a modern, and radically new paradigm in drug development, bringing cheaper and more accessible medicines to the market.']

['', 'Some of the projects the team is currently working on:', 'Expertise with industry standard distributed systems (ie. Spark), data pipeline tools (ie. Airflow).\xa0Capable of quickly building expertise on an as-need basis on new tech stack.Demonstrable experience with Python.\xa0\xa0Understand and design for non-functional concerns such as performance, cost optimization, maintainability and developer experience.Strong communication with engineers, product managers.Ability to work as part of an agile collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.Experience with systems support, debugging and operations.', 'Helped ensure patient privacy by implementing business rules.\xa0', 'Capable of quickly building expertise on an as-need basis on new tech stack.', 'Our people are the center of our success. We are a smart, supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing what’s broken in healthcare. It’s fun, challenging and important. Join us!', 'Strong communication with engineers, product managers.', 'Helped ensure smooth operations of the ingestion pipelines.', 'Demonstrable experience with Python.\xa0\xa0', 'At Komodo Health, our mission is to reduce the global burden of disease. Smarter use of data is essential to this mission. We combine the world’s most comprehensive view of patient encounters with innovative algorithms and decades of clinical expertise to power our Healthcare Map, the industry’s most precise view of the U.S. healthcare system. With the Healthcare Map as our foundation, we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industry.', 'Expertise with industry standard distributed systems (ie. Spark), data pipeline tools (ie. Airflow).\xa0', 'What you bring to Komodo:', 'This role will be a key contributor to the design and implementation of data engineering pipelines to ingest billions of medical and prescription claims, as well as other data sources.\xa0Our data ingestion use cases are complex (hundreds of fields, many come as multiple data files that need to be linked), and implementing robust data quality processes and frameworks is crucial.', 'Building new architecture focused on improving consistency between different pipelines, improving ability to backfill, and increasing data quality.\xa0', 'Ability to work as part of an agile collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.', 'Ingesting new complex data sources.\xa0Many of our data sources consist of a large historical load, followed by regular incremental deliveries.\xa0', 'We Breathe Life Into Data!', 'Enabling data ingestion as a service - to enable other teams to self-serve their ingestion needs when they are less sophisticated', 'Owned ingestion of several complex data sources and / or enhanced existing data sources.\xa0', 'Understand and design for non-functional concerns such as performance, cost optimization, maintainability and developer experience.', 'The Opportunity at Komodo Health', 'Participated in design and implemented distributed data systems using Spark or similar technologies.', 'Optimized the pipelines for performance and cost.\xa0', 'Komodo aims to build the best healthcare data architecture in the industry.\xa0As we are maturing, we are investing in our core data assets, and continually expanding the number and diversity of the data sources we are ingesting.\xa0', 'Looking back on your first 12 months at Komodo Health, you will have…', 'Building new architecture focused on improving consistency between different pipelines, improving ability to backfill, and increasing data quality.\xa0Ingesting new complex data sources.\xa0Many of our data sources consist of a large historical load, followed by regular incremental deliveries.\xa0Enabling data ingestion as a service - to enable other teams to self-serve their ingestion needs when they are less sophisticated', 'Owned ingestion of several complex data sources and / or enhanced existing data sources.\xa0Participated in design and implemented distributed data systems using Spark or similar technologies.Collaborated with product managers and data scientists to implement validation and/or data quality enhancements.Optimized the pipelines for performance and cost.\xa0Helped ensure smooth operations of the ingestion pipelines.Helped ensure patient privacy by implementing business rules.\xa0', 'Collaborated with product managers and data scientists to implement validation and/or data quality enhancements.', 'Our Data Ingestion team is a high-performing team working with big data at scale - they both ingest data and evolve the architecture to increase efficiency.\xa0The team is currently starting work on version 2.0 of their architecture, focused around improving efficiency, reducing operations and improving data quality.\xa0Our data comes in daily, meaning we do batch processing and not streaming.\xa0', 'Experience with systems support, debugging and operations.']

['', 'At least 2 years experience with commercial software development.', 'Operate across our evolving technology stack - we’re developing in Java, React, GraphQL, SQL and more.', 'Experience with modern web development technologies, like React, HTML5, and GraphQL.', 'Ability to design and query relational databases.', ' Code! Most of our engineers release code to production every few days and we have a daily release cycle. Take responsibility for the quality of the code you produce. Operate across our evolving technology stack - we’re developing in Java, React, GraphQL, SQL and more. Take responsibility for all aspects of software engineering, from design to implementation, QA, and maintenance. Touch code at every level – from the UI, through backend microservices and down to the database. Collaborate closely with Product and design teams to define feature specifications and develop high quality deliverables for our customers. ['', 'With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Douyin, Toutiao, Helo, and Resso, ByteDance now has a portfolio of applications available in over 150 markets and 75 languages.', 'Qualifications:', 'ByteDance is committed to providing reasonable accommodations during our recruitment process. If you need assistance or accommodation, please reach out to us at USRC@bytedance.com.', '- BS degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or other relevant majors with 2+ year of work experience ', '- Work with engineers to design machine learning solutions for anti-abuse systems', '- Partner with operatives to quickly respond to rapidly evolving threats', '- Solid technical / data-mining skills and ability to work with large volume data to detect and identify abusive actions in Bytedance products (e.g. TikTok)', '- 2+ years of industry experience in predictive analytics and/or statistical modeling role', '- Ability to think critically and to formulate solutions to problems in a clear, concise, and timely manner', "Our Security team is missioned to build infrastructures, platforms, and technologies, as well as to support cross-functional teams to protect our users, products, and infrastructures. In this team, you'll have a unique opportunity to have first-hand exposure to the strategy of the company in key security initiatives, especially in building scalable and secure-by-design systems and solutions.  Our challenges are not your regular day-to-day technical problems; you'll be part of a team that's developing new solutions to new challenges of a kind not previously addressed by big tech. It's working fast, at scale, and we're making a difference.", 'Responsibilities：', "ByteDance is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At ByteDance, our mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.", 'Founded in 2012, ByteDance is a technology company operating a range of content platforms that inform, educate, entertain, and inspire people across languages, cultures, and geographies.']

', 'Identifying cancer-associated genes and pathways', ' A medical, genomics, or scientific background is preferred, but we primarily are looking for an enthusiasm to contribute to advances in the scientific understanding and treatment of cancer . ', ' Discovery, citation, and reuse of data through well organized, well documented datasets ', ' EEO is The Law - click here for more information ', ' Publication and distribution of data, including providing access to datasets e.g. through a public data repository and lab portals ', ' Excellent communication skills and the ability to perform effectively in a fast paced environment ', ' Data organization experience, with a preference for genomic and biomedical data. ', ' Experience in cloud infrastructure ', 'Check out this video for a look into our community!', ' Evaluation of which data should be retained long-term ', ' All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status. ', ' Archiving data as part of an historical record ', ' Long-term storage of data to meet requirements of human subject data privacy guidelines, other granting agencies, and the Broad Institute, as well as deletion of unneeded data. ', ' Check out this video for a look into our community!', ' Job Description: Biomedical Research Data Management Engineer ', ' A Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Bioinformatics or a related field ', 'Heterogeneity and clonal evolution of cancer', ' Equal Opportunity Employer Minorities/Women/Protected Veterans/Disabled ', ' Fluency in Python and Unix Shell programming ', ' A Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Bioinformatics or a related field  Fluency in Python and Unix Shell programming  Experience in cloud infrastructure  Familiarity with genomic data types and data sets  Excellent communication skills and the ability to perform effectively in a fast paced environment  Must be able to handle a variety of tasks; effectively solve problems with numerous and complex variables; and be able to shift priorities rapidly  Excellent oral and written communication skills (The position will work closely with small project teams of 2-4 researchers. Interfacing with project teams in-person and on-line is a key aspect of this position.)  Data organization experience, with a preference for genomic and biomedical data.  Understanding of security and cost of data storage and data lifecycle. ', 'Responsibilities', ' Lab Overview ', 'Collaborative Science', 'Characterizing the cancer genome', ' Initial production of raw data and initial short-term storage  Analysis of raw data, generating analyzed data  Publication and distribution of data, including providing access to datasets e.g. through a public data repository and lab portals  Evaluation of which data should be retained long-term  Long-term storage of data to meet requirements of human subject data privacy guidelines, other granting agencies, and the Broad Institute, as well as deletion of unneeded data.  Archiving data as part of an historical record  Developing and managing data storage policies and monitoring expenses (e.g. cloud and on-prem data storage tiers).  Discovery, citation, and reuse of data through well organized, well documented datasets ', ' Developing and managing data storage policies and monitoring expenses (e.g. cloud and on-prem data storage tiers). ['', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Identify and validate sources of third-party data to augment Budderfly data, resulting in more comprehensive data sets.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BS in Computer Science, Data Science, Machine Learning, Statistics or related quantitative field (Masters or PhD is a plus).', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience using reporting tools such as QuickSight, Tableu, Qlik, etc. is a plus.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide the analysis required to support performance targets for energy saving solutions.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Create dashboards that turn data into information.', 'Qualifications:', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Utilize data from multiple sources to evaluate both the performance of energy saving technologies across multiple sites, as well as aggregate performance of all technologies at a single site.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design and build new data set processes for modeling, data mining, and production use. ', 'Job Responsibilities:', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong background coding in Python, SQL and Linux, or other programming or scripting language such as R or MATLAB in required.', 'Budderfly, Inc. (Budderfly - www.budderfly.com) is a fast-growth, venture backed energy management outsourcing company that delivers energy savings with no out-of-pocket costs to our customers through our unique Energy Efficiency-as-a-Service solution. We provide the technology, the capital and the expertise to deliver the energy efficient savings solutions without the project risks or the frustration of competing financial tradeoffs. We combine monitoring, maintenance, and upgrades such as LED lighting, superior HVAC, Budderfly IoT devices, and temperature and refrigeration controls into an easy, one-stop solution.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience working with AWS tools such as S3, Kinesis, Glue, EMR, and EC2 is a plus.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Perform statistical analysis to assist in identifying energy consumption that is outside of normal bounds.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with Machine Learning tools such as Jupyter notebook, SageMaker is a plus.', 'Desired Characteristics:', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience preparing, performing statistical analysis, and presenting findings on large data sets, including timeseries data is required.', 'Job Location:', 'Budderfly, Inc. (Budderfly - www.budderfly.com) is a fast-growth, venture backed energy management outsourcing company that ', 'Data Scientist', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience building data models and using Machine Learning algorithms (for example forecasting with DeepAR and ARIMA) is required.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Able to work independently.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong interpersonal, analytical, verbal and written communication skills.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Perform and interpret energy data case studies and solution experiments published by third parties, and incorporate best practices.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Passion for energy savings and the green economy.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Five or more years’ experience in statistical analyses, preferably with relevant experience in energy savings evaluation and quantification.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Determine new ways to improve data and search quality and predictive capabilities.', 'Job Location:\xa0Shelton, Connecticut (company headquarters), but remote work a possibility.', 'The policy of Budderfly is to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, citizenship status, age, national origin, ancestry, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected status and to affirmatively seek to advance the principles of equal employment opportunity.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop prototypes, proof of concepts, algorithms, predictive models, and custom analysis. Design and build new data sets.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Creative problem solver with the ability to think out of the box and bring a new perspective.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience building ETL pipelines using tools like Prefect, Airflow, and AWS Glue is required.', 'We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced individual to join our team as a Data Scientist. In this role, the individual will report to our Vice President of Technology and be responsible for all energy saving solution analysis, working with business teams across our leading energy management company.', 'Budderfly is committed to being an Equal Opportunity Employer and offers opportunities to all job seekers, including job seekers with disabilities. If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Company’s career web page as a result of your disability.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Assist in establishing strategies for handling and processing of data gaps.']

['', 'Establishes, modifies, and documents data governance projects and recommendations. Implements data governance practices in partnership with business stakeholders and peers.Interprets company and regulatory policies on data.Educates others on data governance processes, practices, policies, and guidelines.Provides recommendations on needed updates or inputs into data governance policies, practices, or guidelines.', 'Uses modern tools, techniques, and architectures to partially or completely automate the most common, repeatable and tedious data preparation and integration tasks.', 'Assembles large, complex data across all data platforms (for example, relational, dimensional, NoSQL) and data tools .', 'Open up our data logs to uncover important patterns.', 'Defines and identifies the most suitable sources for required data that is fit for purpose, referring to external sources as required.', 'OR', 'Reviews the solution and application design to ensure it meets business, technical, and data requirements. ['', ' You have 5+ years of experience in engineering and machine learning, relevant experience with marketing or product analytics is a plus;  You are comfortable with owning complex engineering problems and architecting their solutions;  You have experience in or are open to learning the Hadoop ecosystem;  You have programming skills in multiple programming languages and paradigms. You will mainly rely on Hadoop/Apache ecosystem, Python, PHP, and SQL in this role;  You have experience working on interventions or tools powered by ML;  You can independently drive projects, document, review code, understand and collaboratively maintain large codebases;  You are a big fan of professional software engineering methods and standards such as coding conventions, code reviews, continuous integration, build processes, and testing;  You have strong multi-functional communication skills that help document, simplify and move sophisticated problems forward;  You enjoy thinking about how machine learning can be used to drive business success and this type of work excites you.  ', ' ', 'Lead development of our internal ML pipeline’s API; ', ' Diversity and Inclusion at Automattic', 'Work with Marketing to implement, optimise, and evaluate ML-based email, acquisition, or nudge campaigns; ', 'You have 5+ years of experience in engineering and machine learning, relevant experience with marketing or product analytics is a plus; ', 'You can independently drive projects, document, review code, understand and collaboratively maintain large codebases; ', 'This can involve things like:', 'Write Python & SQL code to contribute to our internal ML pipeline; ', 'Like all positions at Automattic, you’ll work remotely, and can be based wherever you live! ', 'You are comfortable with owning complex engineering problems and architecting their solutions; ', 'We are the company behind WordPress.com, Jetpack, WooCommerce, and Tumblr. We are looking for an experienced Python developer to join our Data Team! The role will contribute to the development and scaling of our Machine Learning pipeline, and help our marketers and developers integrate Machine Learning into their work. This position is for a top-tier Python Engineers who have knowledge or interest in Marketing or Product Analytics, experience working with data scientists, and outstanding coding practices. ', 'You have programming skills in multiple programming languages and paradigms. You will mainly rely on Hadoop/Apache ecosystem, Python, PHP, and SQL in this role; ', 'You will be responsible for working on our in-house machine learning pipeline to unlock business opportunities for WordPress.com to more efficiently grow and retain its customer base. The role requires excellent engineering skills, an understanding of machine learning inputs and outputs, and the creativity to see how it can be integrated into Automattic’s processes for optimizing our products and marketing efforts. ', 'We’re improving diversity in the tech industry. At Automattic, we want people to love their work and show respect and empathy to all. We welcome differences and strive to increase participation from traditionally underrepresented groups. Our D&I committee involves Automatticians across the company and drives grassroots change. For example, this group has helped facilitate private online spaces for affiliated Automatticians to gather and helps run a monthly D&I People Lab series for further learning. Diversity and Inclusion is a priority at Automattic, though our dedication influences far more than just Automatticians: We make our products freely available and translate our products into and offer customer support in numerous languages. We require unconscious bias training for our hiring teams and ensure our products are accessible across different bandwidths and devices. Read more about our dedication to diversity and inclusion. ', ' Write Python & SQL code to contribute to our internal ML pipeline;  Write Python and PHP code to integrate ML outputs from our pipeline into existing tools such as Looker, our A/B testing platform, and email provider;  Lead development of our internal ML pipeline’s API;  Work with Marketing to implement, optimise, and evaluate ML-based email, acquisition, or nudge campaigns;  Help developers, marketers, and product managers understand how to access, implement, and rigorously evaluate and optimise ML-based interventions.  ', 'Write Python and PHP code to integrate ML outputs from our pipeline into existing tools such as Looker, our A/B testing platform, and email provider; ', 'You are a big fan of professional software engineering methods and standards such as coding conventions, code reviews, continuous integration, build processes, and testing; ', 'You have strong multi-functional communication skills that help document, simplify and move sophisticated problems forward; ', ' How to Apply', 'Help developers, marketers, and product managers understand how to access, implement, and rigorously evaluate and optimise ML-based interventions. ', 'You have experience in or are open to learning the Hadoop ecosystem; ', 'You have experience working on interventions or tools powered by ML; ', 'Does this sound exciting? job_title: Data Analyst/ Data Consultant/ Data Engineer
job_text: ['', "Supporting the organization's quality program", 'Data Analyst/ Data Consultant/ Data Engineer', "The Data Analyst/ Data Consultant/ Data Engineer, will be responsible for collecting, analyzing and reporting data. Ensuring the integrity of such data and generate reports that verify and document their accuracy. This position will be working in a deadline-oriented, fast-paced environment as part of a team consisting of consulting and operations staff. The teams' goal is to provide superior service to states and large school districts in the areas of special education management systems, data warehousing, federal claiming, and other programs. The Data Analyst/ Data Consultant/ Data Engineer role revolves around technology, policy and financial management functions. ", 'The Data Analyst/ Data Consultant/ Data Engineer will be interacting with the Product Owner of Risk Data Mart and the Enterprise Data Management Team to organize current data in the banking and financial service industries. This position would do some of the hands-on work but would also be coordinating with the other DataStage or Cognos developers. ', ' ', 'Excellent organizational, oral presentation and written communication skills', 'Data Analyst/ Data Consultant/ Data Engineer Position Preferences:', 'Compiling data and analyzing results', 'Position Requirements:', 'Ability to dig in with the Business and asking a ton of insightful questions ', 'DB2 and Netezza familiarity', 'Consulting will be working with Business to prioritize these enhancements', 'Generating custom reports for internal and external clients', 'Assisting in the completion of appropriate client set-up and maintenance forms', 'Previous experience utilizing Cognos, DB2, SQL - Structured Query Language', "At Vaco, we connect professionals with excellent career growth opportunities! Our team helps you get the advantage over your competitors through our direct access to HR departments and hiring managers. We currently have an exciting opportunity for an experienced Data Analyst/ Data Consultant/ Data Engineer. Apply with Vaco, and we will advocate on your behalf! We promote your strengths and experience and help prepare you for your interview by supplying you with key information about our client's background and expectations. We provide great insight about trends in the market and keep you up to date on compensation expectations, company culture and growth opportunities.", 'Sharpening data SQL logic that happens before reporting', "Compiling data and analyzing resultsPreparing and distributing reportsEnsuring data integrityDeveloping and producing reports utilized in measuring data accuracyAssisting in the completion of appropriate client set-up and maintenance formsSupporting internal and external usersCreating exception reports to identify fields of incorrect dataGenerating custom reports for internal and external clientsSupporting the organization's quality program", "Communication Skills: Must communicate well with clients, team members, and ancillary resources. This includes both presenting ideas or findings, as well as drawing out client or team member key concerns or other relevant information.Attention to Detail: The conclusions drawn from this data analysis will drive critical departmental initiatives. Accuracy and attention to detail are paramount.Software implementation activities including training, site preparation, and project management.Documents client discussions, gather requirements and engages technical team as it relates to the emerging data structure and reporting needs, in close partnership with the project leadsMaintains data dictionaries, data flow diagrams, etc. for EDPlan reports and related functionsAbility to dig in with the Business and asking a ton of insightful questions Previous experience utilizing Cognos, DB2, SQL - Structured Query LanguageDatabase skills- SQL knowledge is a necessaryStrong analytical skills, including the ability to analyze and organize dataExcellent organizational, oral presentation and written communication skillsResearch and project management capabilities preferredDataStage is their ETL tool, but the Consultant doesn't have to be DataStage expert (some experience or familiarity would be great)", 'Responsibilities of the Data Analyst/ Data Consultant/ Data Engineer role include:', 'Job #162269', 'The Data Analyst/ Data Consultant/ Data Engineer will be responsible for reviewing, formatting, importing/exporting, transforming, validating or modeling data with the purpose of understanding or drawing conclusions to drive strategical and operational decision-making. The positions responsibilities include presenting data in charts, graphs and tables as well as designing and developing system embedded processes and manual verification methods for collecting and analyzing data.', 'The Business has a lot of EDW (Enterprise Data Warehouse) ongoing enhancements', 'The Business has a lot of EDW (Enterprise Data Warehouse) ongoing enhancementsConsulting will be working with Business to prioritize these enhancementsCleaning up historical dataSharpening data SQL logic that happens before reportingSQL prototyping that demonstrates the output the Business wants to see ', 'Strong analytical skills, including the ability to analyze and organize data', 'Cognos or other reporting background', 'Credit Cards/ Deposits', 'Ensuring data integrity', 'Cleaning up historical data', 'Attention to Detail: The conclusions drawn from this data analysis will drive critical departmental initiatives. ["Simplot is on a transformational journey focused on delivering value to our customers now and in the future. The Information Management and Analytics (IM&A) Team is responsible for creating and maintaining a modern data and analytics platform to support our company's dynamic global needs.  In this position, you will contribute to building a complete value chain from source system to a Kimball-modeled Enterprise Data Warehouse and Business Intelligence (BI) Platform, providing insight across the entire organization.  We are currently looking for innovative and driven collaborators interested in joining our Information Management team to provide solutions for our Business Partners and help inspire a data-driven culture. We currently have a Data Engineer III or IV positions available at our Simplot global headquarters in Boise, ID.", "Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, business information systems, or strong equivalent.", " Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, business information systems, or strong equivalent. ", 'Extensive experience developing solutions using technologies such as Talend, Java, C#, C++, Azure Logic Apps, SSIS, Spark, Kafka, T-SQL, etc.', 'Build future data and analytics environment for a diverse global enterprise.', "Build, test, and deploy the raw layer of Simplot's Data Warehouse and analytics model development using Data Vault modeling techniques.", 'Cultivate cross-functional, collaborative relationships with Product Owners and IT Professionals.', 'Strong data modeling experience using Data Vault or Kimball principles.', 'Contribute to the lifecycle and support of the SQL Server, Data Lake, Data Management & ETL, Data Archive, and Integration platforms (The Simplot Data Platform).', 'Possesses a growth mind set and eager to learn new technologies/methods to contribute to a collaborative Team!', 'Excellent interpersonal communication and writing skills with a focus on customer service and servant leadership.', 'Utilize Azure DevOps for work item management, CI/CD automation, and source control. ', 'Data quality monitoring and collaboration with data owners/stewards on quality rules, resolutions, etc.', 'Summary', "Understand business needs and collaborate to source data from application databases, manufacturing equipment, IoT sensors, flat files, API's, etc.", 'Build, test, and deploy orchestrations to ensure all data is captured and classified in the Data Lake.', 'Manage and prioritize time across project, support, and enhancement initiatives.', 'Strong experience writing, debugging, and optimizing advanced SQL queries.', 'Experience with microservices, service bus, and essential pub/sub patterns.', "Experience building API's using Talend, C#, Azure, or similar.", " Excellent interpersonal communication and writing skills with a focus on customer service and servant leadership. Strong experience writing, debugging, and optimizing advanced SQL queries. Strong data modeling experience using Data Vault or Kimball principles. Extensive experience developing solutions using technologies such as Talend, Java, C#, C++, Azure Logic Apps, SSIS, Spark, Kafka, T-SQL, etc. Experience building API's using Talend, C#, Azure, or similar. Experience sourcing data from IoT, API, and similar sources. Experience with microservices, service bus, and essential pub/sub patterns. Experience using database engine execution plans to write optimized queries. Working knowledge of Big Data technologies and concepts a plus (growth area for Simplot). Possesses a growth mind set and eager to learn new technologies/methods to contribute to a collaborative Team!", 'Participate in design and code reviews, documentation, and contribute to company-wide standards.', 'Communicate technical and business topics to key Business Stakeholders.', 'Relevant Experience', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Data Engineer III or IV ', 'Typical Education', 'Experience sourcing data from IoT, API, and similar sources.', 'Working knowledge of Big Data technologies and concepts a plus (growth area for Simplot).', 'Design, build, and maintain reliable pipelines to move and transform data accurately based on architectural standards (using Talend, Spark, Kafka, SQL, etc.).', 'Experience using database engine execution plans to write optimized queries.', " Contribute to the lifecycle and support of the SQL Server, Data Lake, Data Management & ETL, Data Archive, and Integration platforms (The Simplot Data Platform). Design, build, and maintain reliable pipelines to move and transform data accurately based on architectural standards (using Talend, Spark, Kafka, SQL, etc.). Data lineage and traceability including implementing measures required by regulatory authorities and Simplot data privacy/use policies. Build, test, and deploy the raw layer of Simplot's Data Warehouse and analytics model development using Data Vault modeling techniques. Build, test, and deploy orchestrations to ensure all data is captured and classified in the Data Lake. Data quality monitoring and collaboration with data owners/stewards on quality rules, resolutions, etc. Understand business needs and collaborate to source data from application databases, manufacturing equipment, IoT sensors, flat files, API's, etc. Utilize Azure DevOps for work item management, CI/CD automation, and source control.  Participate in design and code reviews, documentation, and contribute to company-wide standards. Cultivate cross-functional, collaborative relationships with Product Owners and IT Professionals. Communicate technical and business topics to key Business Stakeholders. Manage and prioritize time across project, support, and enhancement initiatives. Build future data and analytics environment for a diverse global enterprise. ", 'Data lineage and traceability including implementing measures required by regulatory authorities and Simplot data privacy/use policies.']

', ' Experience with Looker ', ' Design and conduct exploratory data research projects that drive our product roadmap and business strategy ', 'About The Role', ' Strong proficiency with constructing efficient SQL and ideally in Python ', ' Communicative & empathetic. You are happy when helping others succeed, particularly your team and partners across the company. ', 'Bonus points', 'You will', ' Someone with extremely high standards that obsesses over data accuracy. You’re practical and know perfect is the enemy of good, but you aspire for us to be great. You care deeply about the quality of your work and our data. You are passionate about finding the insights and “truth” that data can give. ', "  Someone with extremely high standards that obsesses over data accuracy. You’re practical and know perfect is the enemy of good, but you aspire for us to be great. You care deeply about the quality of your work and our data. You are passionate about finding the insights and “truth” that data can give.   A big picture, systems thinker. You think about how the whole is a sum of many parts and how we can properly measure them end to end such that we have the per context for insights.   An owner. You feel personally accountable and responsible and know seeing the problem is less than half of it. You look for problems and inefficiencies and find elegant solutions to them before they become major issues.   Fast-paced. You love the speed of and impact you have in startups. Conversely you never, ever want to be a tiny cog in a gigantic machine.   An open-minded learner. You live to learn new things, like staying up to date on new technologies, tools, and techniques. You are inspired by what people inside and outside Envoy know and are eager to incorporate the world's knowledge into your work.   Emotionally mature & humble. You care about being effective over being right. Ideally you’ve made major changes & decisions in your life and learned from the results.   Communicative & empathetic. You are happy when helping others succeed, particularly your team and partners across the company.  ", ' Emotionally mature & humble. You care about being effective over being right. Ideally you’ve made major changes & decisions in your life and learned from the results. ', ' Partner closely with anyone and everyone across the company to build dashboards & extract insights. The goal is to teach folks how to fish, not fish for them. That can come through building the 1st rev, helping with more advanced queries, dashboards, & views, or simply pairing & teaching. ', '  Partner closely with anyone and everyone across the company to build dashboards & extract insights. The goal is to teach folks how to fish, not fish for them. That can come through building the 1st rev, helping with more advanced queries, dashboards, & views, or simply pairing & teaching.   Drive quality into our data pipeline ,and ultimately our data, be it through good standards, in-depth & helpful code reviews, data validation methods, anomaly detection and alerting, multivariate experiments w/ proper control group(s), partnering with engineering on instrumentation, well-thought out ETL, and clearly and succinctly documenting where and how funky 3rd party data becomes our clean, gold-standard set.   Facilitate decisions on standards, frameworks & tools, build vs use, and best practices. We try and keep our data and tools simple, clean, readable, and consistent to maximize our time on Envoy problems. Our current tech stack: Redshift, Python, Airflow, dbt, Looker   Design and conduct exploratory data research projects that drive our product roadmap and business strategy   Learn, teach, & share. With your fellow teammates and the world (blogs, open source, etc). It’s good for you, good for Envoy, and good for the world.  ', ' Learn, teach, & share. With your fellow teammates and the world (blogs, open source, etc). It’s good for you, good for Envoy, and good for the world. ', ' Knowledge of & experience with where the data comes from and how it makes it through the pipeline into a query result or interface. You’ve worked 1st hand (or in close partnership with an engineer) with various data storage technologies, pipelines, ETL, and visualization systems at scale. We use Redshift, Looker, dbt, Stitch, Split.io. ', " An open-minded learner. You live to learn new things, like staying up to date on new technologies, tools, and techniques. You are inspired by what people inside and outside Envoy know and are eager to incorporate the world's knowledge into your work. ", ' Experience with dbt, a framework used to build and manage complex data pipelines ', ' Experience with algorithms, tools, and techniques for data mining, linear regression, machine learning. ', 'About Envoy', ' An owner. You feel personally accountable and responsible and know seeing the problem is less than half of it. You look for problems and inefficiencies and find elegant solutions to them before they become major issues. ', ' Facilitate decisions on standards, frameworks & tools, build vs use, and best practices. We try and keep our data and tools simple, clean, readable, and consistent to maximize our time on Envoy problems. Our current tech stack: Redshift, Python, Airflow, dbt, Looker ', ' A passion for scale, performance, and quality. You think people deserve access to their data in milliseconds and feel incorrect data is an insult. You worry about what happens when we have 100x more data & data sources, but are practical and experienced to know how to solve what we need right now. ', 'You have ', ' A big picture, systems thinker. You think about how the whole is a sum of many parts and how we can properly measure them end to end such that we have the per context for insights. ', '  Strong proficiency with constructing efficient SQL and ideally in Python   Background and experience in data analytics and/or data science, and several years’ working experience in non-trivial data environments. Preferably folks who have at least 3-4+ years’ experience (enough to have been around a number of environments, data sets, and situations to have good breadth and depth)   Experience with algorithms, tools, and techniques for data mining, linear regression, machine learning.   Knowledge of & experience with where the data comes from and how it makes it through the pipeline into a query result or interface. You’ve worked 1st hand (or in close partnership with an engineer) with various data storage technologies, pipelines, ETL, and visualization systems at scale. We use Redshift, Looker, dbt, Stitch, Split.io.   A passion for scale, performance, and quality. You think people deserve access to their data in milliseconds and feel incorrect data is an insult. You worry about what happens when we have 100x more data & data sources, but are practical and experienced to know how to solve what we need right now.  ', ' Background and experience in data analytics and/or data science, and several years’ working experience in non-trivial data environments. Preferably folks who have at least 3-4+ years’ experience (enough to have been around a number of environments, data sets, and situations to have good breadth and depth) ', 'You are ', ' Drive quality into our data pipeline ,and ultimately our data, be it through good standards, in-depth & helpful code reviews, data validation methods, anomaly detection and alerting, multivariate experiments w/ proper control group(s), partnering with engineering on instrumentation, well-thought out ETL, and clearly and succinctly documenting where and how funky 3rd party data becomes our clean, gold-standard set. ']

job_title: Data Engineer, Data and Analytics Unit - Test & Trace Corps (57879)
job_text: ['', 'Preference will be given to candidates with:', 'Completing complex network, statistical and programming analyses to clean and prepare data, ensuring accuracy\xa0', 'Cleaning large datasets, with responsibility for accuracy and complex analyses through programming and performing statistical analyses on large data sets to ensure integrity of data for analyses and use across the Data, Analytics and Product Development Team to support planning, reporting and development initiatives under the Test and Trace CorpsCompleting complex network, statistical and programming analyses to clean and prepare data, ensuring accuracy\xa0Serving as the internal engineering consultant to solve structural data issues within the Quality Control (QC) workflow\xa0\xa0\xa0Regulating the cleanliness of data produced from Data Engineers, Data Scientists, and Data Managers across the Data, Analytics and Product Development Team\xa0Collaborating with data staff and other departments to identify and mitigate potential data issuesAuditing and reporting on the QC of data migration and integrations throughout the Test and Trace Corps organizationChecking and preparing data to provide to the Data Scientist and other analysts, as needed', '2. Five (5) years of progressive, responsible experience in the field of data processing, computer systems and applications.', '4. A satisfactory equivalent combination of training, education and experience', 'Collaborating with data staff and other departments to identify and mitigate potential data issues', 'Come join the largest public hospital system in the nation! Every day, we work together to make an extraordinary difference in the health and well-being of each individual we serve – without exception. Join our team and help us create a positive human experience.', 'Strong quality control abilities and exceptional attention to detail', 'Serving as the internal engineering consultant to solve structural data issues within the Quality Control (QC) workflow\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Empower Every New Yorker — Without Exception — to Live the Healthiest Life Possible', '1. A Baccalaureate Degree from an accredited college or university with a major in Computer Science, Systems Engineering, applied Mathematics, Business Administration, Economics/Statistics, Telecommunications, Data Communications, or a related field of study; and', 'Cleaning large datasets, with responsibility for accuracy and complex analyses through programming and performing statistical analyses on large data sets to ensure integrity of data for analyses and use across the Data, Analytics and Product Development Team to support planning, reporting and development initiatives under the Test and Trace Corps', 'Checking and preparing data to provide to the Data Scientist and other analysts, as needed', 'Minimum Qualifications:', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to explain data systems to non-technical teams', 'Auditing and reporting on the QC of data migration and integrations throughout the Test and Trace Corps organization', 'Regulating the cleanliness of data produced from Data Engineers, Data Scientists, and Data Managers across the Data, Analytics and Product Development Team\xa0', '3+ years of\xa0experience in a data training, analytics, management, or QC role', 'NYC Residency Preferred', '3. Broad knowledge and expertise in the characteristics of computers, peripheral devices, communications systems and hardware capabilities, programming languages, E.D.P. applications, systems analysis methodology, data management and retrieval techniques; or', 'Ability to work autonomously, think analytically, and anticipate data issues to solve before they arise', 'Ability to work autonomously, think analytically, and anticipate data issues to solve before they ariseExcellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to explain data systems to non-technical teamsStrong quality control abilities and exceptional attention to detail3+ years of\xa0experience in a data training, analytics, management, or QC roleNYC Residency Preferred', 'Summary of Duties and Responsibilities:', 'Operations Specialty requires supervisory experience (5 years).', 'Network Services requires a telecommunications background and experience.', 'Department Preferences:', 'Reporting to the Senior Data Engineer within the Data and Analytics Unit, the Data Engineer designs, evaluates and tests data structures and will be responsible for:', 'The Test and Trace Corps is looking for a Data Engineer to join the Data, Analytics and Product Development Team, which is dedicated to organizing, analyzing, and communicating data as well as building technology solutions, in order to support and inform programmatic and operational efforts of the initiative.']

['', 'Understand the inner workings of neural networks to uncover edge cases and make safety determinations', "WHAT YOU'LL BRING", 'Build software infrastructure to enable learning algorithms to leverage our large-scale fleet data', 'Generalist mindset, with the ability to work cross-platform, from spooling up cloud compute services to optimizing for embedded systems', 'Zipline is an equal opportunity employer and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws or our own sensibilities.', 'ABOUT YOU AND THE ROLE', 'Experience building reproducible data and machine learning pipelines', 'Strong software engineering skills, with mastery of relevant languages like Python and C++', 'Work with a multidisciplinary team to evaluate and select next generation sensor configurations for our vehicles', 'We value diversity at Zipline and welcome applications from those who are traditionally underrepresented in tech. If you like the sound of this position but are not sure if you are the perfect fit, please apply!', 'WHAT ELSE YOU NEED TO KNOW', "WHAT YOU'LL DO", 'Design integrated machine learning solutions that enable our highly maneuverable aircraft to perceive general aviation aircraft, power lines, and radio towers, so that we can steer clear of, dodge or otherwise avoid themBuild software infrastructure to enable learning algorithms to leverage our large-scale fleet dataWork with a multidisciplinary team to evaluate and select next generation sensor configurations for our vehiclesUnderstand the inner workings of neural networks to uncover edge cases and make safety determinationsIdentify and mitigate bottlenecks in our machine learning development processes', 'Deep understanding of the theory and practice of modern machine learning techniquesStrong software engineering skills, with mastery of relevant languages like Python and C++Generalist mindset, with the ability to work cross-platform, from spooling up cloud compute services to optimizing for embedded systemsExperience building reproducible data and machine learning pipelinesExperience deploying machine learning solutions on real robots\xa0', 'Zipline is at the forefront of a logistics revolution, using autonomous aircraft to deliver just-in-time, lifesaving medical supplies on multiple continents, 7 days a week. We believe access to medical care should not depend on your GPS coordinates.\xa0In service of our mission to operate at global scale, we’re growing our perception capabilities, to expand quickly and safely into new products and locations, with the ultimate goal of delivering essential packages right to your doorstep. Our perception team is looking for a generalist software engineer with an expertise in machine learning, who is passionate about developing perception systems for the real world.', 'Do you want to change the world? Zipline uses drones to deliver critical and lifesaving medicine to thousands of hospitals serving millions of people in multiple countries. Our mission is to provide every human on Earth with instant access to vital medical supplies. Join Zipline and help us make this a reality for billions of people.', 'Identify and mitigate bottlenecks in our machine learning development processes', 'Experience deploying machine learning solutions on real robots\xa0', 'Design integrated machine learning solutions that enable our highly maneuverable aircraft to perceive general aviation aircraft, power lines, and radio towers, so that we can steer clear of, dodge or otherwise avoid them', 'Deep understanding of the theory and practice of modern machine learning techniques', 'ABOUT ZIPLINE']

Some programming experience. Experience handling big data.", '-\xa0Works closely with all business units and engineering teams to develop strategy for long term data platform architecture', '-\xa0Experience working with healthcare data including HL7, CCDAs, Intersystems HealthShare and Cache databases', '-\xa0Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc', '-\xa0Excellent documentation and verbal communication skills. Ability to communicate technical vision in clear terms to peers as well as outside of the engineering/development team', '-\xa0Implements processes and systems to monitor data quality, ensuring production data is always accurate and available for key stakeholders and business processes\xa0', '-\xa0Works closely with a team of frontend and backend engineers, product managers, and analysts', 'SUPERVISORY RESPONSIBILITIES:\xa0', '-\xa0Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring and familiarity with a variety of databases', '-\xa0Strong analytic skills', 'The Data Engineer strives to ensure proper data governance and quality for the Data Strategy team and the entire organization. They analyze complex data elements and systems, data flow, dependencies, and relationships in order to contribute to conceptual physical and logical data models. They work collaboratively with the Data Strategy team, providing support for their data centric needs. The candidate has strong working and conceptual knowledge of building and maintaining physical and logical data models and will also have system management expertise with server and database tuning, query, multidimensional query and index tuning, monitoring, disaster recovery, backup, automated testing, automated schema migration, and continuous deployment.', '-\xa0Ability to architect end-to-end ETL pipelines', '-\xa0Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores', 'QUALIFICATIONS:\xa0', '-\xa0Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets', 'Typical tasks performed include working with the data architect on data warehouse design, ensuring data loads quickly, is easily accessible and rapidly comprehensible for analysts/users; extract, transform, and load (ETL) processing; performing thorough testing and validation in order to support the accuracy of data transformations and data verification to ensure correctness and that data is generally reliable for downstream consumption; data bounds checking and database tuning.\xa0', '-\xa0Contributes to definition of company data assets (data models), and processes to populate data models', '-\xa0Writes unit/integration tests, contributes to Confluence, and documents work', '-\xa0Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement', 'POSITION SUMMARY:\xa0', '-\xa0Experience with database design principals including relationships and normalization, database structures, indexes and views and analyzing requirements and purpose of the database', 'The Data Engineer provides the foundation for analytics, namely the collection, quality assurance and availability of data. This IT role requires a significant set of technical skills, including a deep knowledge of SQL database design and multiple programming languages as well as communication skills to understand what data and analysis the healthcare analysts want to gain from data stores. They are responsible for the maintenance, improvement, cleansing and manipulation of data in the organization’s operational and analytics databases. The Data Engineer defines and builds data pipelines to orchestrate the movement, transformation, validation, and loading of data from the source to the final destination – data stores defined and implemented based on system requirements and data consumer requirements.\xa0', '-\xa0Responsible for expanding and optimizing data and data pipeline architecture, as well as optimizing data flow and collection\xa0', '-\xa0Responsible for optimizing or re-designing data architecture to support the next generation of products and data initiatives', '-\xa0Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases', '-\xa0Performs data analysis required to troubleshoot data related issues and assist in the resolution of data issues', '-\xa0Designs data integrations and data quality framework', '• This job has no supervisory responsibilities.\xa0', '-\xa05+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field. IBM Certified Data Engineer or Google Certified Professional desired.', '-\xa0Develops and maintains scalable data pipelines and builds out new API integrations to support continuing increases in data volume and complexity', '-\xa0Strong skills with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++, Scala, etc\xa0', '-\xa0Experience building processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management']

job_title: Staff, BI Analyst, Data Scientist - Business Intelligence
job_text: ['', ' Experience in BI tool architectures, functions and features. ', ' Data Scientist/Analytics Background is a MUST. ', 'About Us', ' Familiar with Tableau and Looker (LookML) including cloud server management, user access management, site and group management. ', ' Demonstrated leadership and self-direction. Willingness to both teach others and learn new techniques. ', 'The Who, What, Why And Where', ' Strong in python (e.g. pandas, numpy, scikit-learn) or R for data manipulation and analysis. ', ' Be Inclusive: Partner with business stakeholders and embedded analysts in different areas to help think through and plan the right solution for their problems. ', ' Experience with compliance, audit, user access control process and data governance. ', 'Who?', ' Strong in advanced analytics and machine learning, such as predictive analytics, regression, hypothesis testing, causal analysis. ', ' Ability to think strategically and initiate, refine and complete projects proactively with minimal guidance and to supervise junior BI analysts with their projects. ', 'What?', '  7+ years of professional experience in analytics and data science or similar fields, in a fast paced industry and 2+ years of people management experience.   Ability to think strategically and initiate, refine and complete projects proactively with minimal guidance and to supervise junior BI analysts with their projects.   Expert level knowledge in SQL and relational and multidimensional database schemas and designs.   Strong in python (e.g. pandas, numpy, scikit-learn) or R for data manipulation and analysis.   Strong in advanced analytics and machine learning, such as predictive analytics, regression, hypothesis testing, causal analysis.   Experience in BI tool architectures, functions and features.   Familiar with Tableau and Looker (LookML) including cloud server management, user access management, site and group management.   Experience with data warehousing and/or ETL processes, and distributed computing (Hive/Presto) and Snowflake.   Experience with compliance, audit, user access control process and data governance.   Demonstrated leadership and self-direction. Willingness to both teach others and learn new techniques.   Experience project management and Agile delivery methods.   Data Scientist/Analytics Background is a MUST.  ', ' Empower Others: Help create a data-driven culture within Twilio by enabling the teams to be self-sufficient around a single source of truth. ', "  Draw the Owl and Be Bold: Proactively find improvement areas, develop solutions, drive execution and deliver value.   Wear the Customer’s Shoes: Be a true partner, understand real questions behind requests and solve the problem with the best method for the problem.   Be An owner and Write It Down: Motivated to do or achieve something because of one's own enthusiasm or interest, without needing pressure from others. Document knowledge to enable other analysts. Develop and document processes and make sure everyone complies.   Be Inclusive: Partner with business stakeholders and embedded analysts in different areas to help think through and plan the right solution for their problems.   Empower Others: Help create a data-driven culture within Twilio by enabling the teams to be self-sufficient around a single source of truth. ", ' Expert level knowledge in SQL and relational and multidimensional database schemas and designs. ['', "Culture and values are incredibly important to Customer. They inform us of who we are, of how we act. Values aren't posters hanging on a wall or about trite or glib slogans. Our values tell us how we live our lives; how we approach our jobs. ['', 'Unlimited PTO policy', 'Our parent company, Checkr, is disrupting the dormant background screening industry and building a global trust and safety platform. Since graduating Y-Combinator in 2014, Checkr’s product has shifted the on-demand economy. We already host an elite roster of customers and partners including Uber, Instacart, Handy, Zenefits, iCracked, Caviar, and more. We are looking for highly talented teammates to help us continue our growth.', 'The Data Companies is a collection of small services built on C, Java, and Javascript with both SQL and NoSQL databases as well as message queues for asynchronous tasks. As we build our architecture, we welcome new languages and technologies to our stack. job_title: Senior Software Engineer in Test - Storage - (Individual able to work remotely in Colorado)
job_text: ['', 'Senior Software Engineer in Test - Storage - (Individual able to work remotely in Colorado)\xa0', 'Isn’t\xa0it\xa0time you joined our winning team?', 'Minimum of B.S. degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering or 5+ years of related experience.', 'Benefits: Spectra Logic provides a casual work environment, competitive salaries, and a compensation structure that rewards contribution and hard work. Our full benefits package includes 401(k), medical, life, AD&D, flex spending accounts, and company paid short and long term disability. Equal\xa0', '\ufeffSummary of Position:', 'Employment Opportunities (EEO) Statement: Spectra Logic is committed to the practice and policies of equal employment opportunities in the recruitment, employment and promotion of all associates without regard to race, religion, sex, age, gender, minority, veterans, national origin or ancestry.\xa0', 'Education and Experience:', 'Specific Responsibilities:', 'Must be able to work in an Agile environment where requirements and priorities can change very quickly.', 'Minimum of B.S. degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering or 5+ years of related experience.5+ years of Test Engineering experience preferred.Strong analytical, diagnosis, and troubleshooting skills.Experience with basic System Administrator for Windows, Unix, and Linux environments.Must be able to work in an Agile environment where requirements and priorities can change very quickly.Experience with HW and SW integrated solutions a plus.', 'Work closely with engineering development departments within Spectra Logic to facilitate the transfer of knowledge to the Test group for new projects and products.Design test plans and test cases using a variety of technologies that are precise, accurate, repeatable, maintainable, and clean.A thorough understanding of the Spectra Logic Deep Storage Devices product line.Perform root cause analysis on issues found in order to develop an automated regression testsEffectively communicate with other development groups in order to provide all necessary information needed to fix the bugs found.Be passionate about creating world class products by applying new testing methodologies.', 'Experience with HW and SW integrated solutions a plus.', '5+ years of Test Engineering experience preferred.', 'Perform root cause analysis on issues found in order to develop an automated regression tests', 'Status: Full Time', 'Work closely with engineering development departments within Spectra Logic to facilitate the transfer of knowledge to the Test group for new projects and products.', 'You will work in the Test Engineering Group, focused on automated validation of Emerging Markets storage solutions. Day to day activities will include test planning and test case design, implementing automated test infrastructure and automated tests, tracking, and reporting.\xa0Programming experience a must, (i.e., Java or C++ or any mainstream OOP language). Go programming a plus.', '\ufeff', 'Experience with basic System Administrator for Windows, Unix, and Linux environments.', 'Design test plans and test cases using a variety of technologies that are precise, accurate, repeatable, maintainable, and clean.', 'Be passionate about creating world class products by applying new testing methodologies.', '\xa0Education and Experience:', 'Located in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains in Boulder, Colorado,\xa0Privately held since its inception in 1979,\xa0Spectra is allowed to do what is right without having to\xa0satisfy the analysts each quarter. That means our associates and customers come out as winners.\xa0', 'Strong analytical, diagnosis, and troubleshooting skills.', 'Why Spectra?', 'Effectively communicate with other development groups in order to provide all necessary information needed to fix the bugs found.', 'A thorough understanding of the Spectra Logic Deep Storage Devices product line.']
