'We are looking for a skilled leader in the Data and Analytics industry with a strong background in consulting with an entrepreneurial spirit. You likely have experience with a variety of architectures, patterns, and methodologies focused on Analytics Strategy, Data Governance & Master Data Management, Data Architecture(s), Distributed Systems, ETL, Big Data, IoT, Data Visualization and Analytics. You should be passionate about research, prototyping and staying current on emerging technologies through continued education and significant community participation. You should value interacting and communicating with Enterprise clients, mentoring other consultants and acting as a thought leader within Data and Analytics. ', 'Enterprise experience with emerging cloud platforms and development patterns (AWS, Azure, Google, etc.) ', 'Engagement Management:', 'Set data architecture principles, create models of data that enable the implementation of the intended business architecture, create diagrams showing key data entities and create an inventory of the data needed to implement the architecture vision. ', 'Day-to-day, you will:', 'Experience with building stream processing systems, using solutions such as Storm or Spark-Streaming and messaging services such as Kafka, RabbitMQ, etc. ', 'Build teams and guide consultants through all phases of delivery including: requirements elicitation, solution architecture, and driving an effective development team \xa0 ', 'Experience with analytics and visualization platforms such as Tableau, PowerBI, Domo, Looker, etc.)', 'Practice Development:\xa0Play a critical role in building the Data and Analytics practice within the industry by way of; ', 'Business Development –\xa0Lead Practice Business Development activities working with recruiters, Practice Directors and AIM Consultant’s Leadership team ', 'Our Minneapolis team is seeking a Principal Data Engineer to join our Data & Analytics practices.  Our Consultants help our clients strategize, design, build and operate data and analytical platforms through our high-performance teams of data engineers, architects, data scientists and analytical leaders. We shape the future of what data-driven organizations look like by driving processes for extracting and using data in a creative way while creating new lines of thinking with our clients under diverse situations. ', 'Experience', 'Thought Leadership:', 'Day-to-day, you will:\xa0 ', 'Practice Building –\xa0Assist in the overall growth of the practice area through a combination of business development, talent management, ownership of delivery production and thought leadership ', 'Deliver projects to contractual expectations with a high degree of customer satisfaction ', 'Engagement Management:\xa0Ensure acceptance of proposed technical solutions from top management levels at the client, manage engagement delivery content and quality assurance, perform risk assessment and lead project planning from end-to-end ', 'Provide Data Architecture Solutions:', 'Elicit clear and actionable client business requirements and develop innovative, compelling solution strategies to meet those requirements ', 'Business Development –']

job_title: Data Scientist, ML Evaluation - McD Tech Labs
job_text: ['', '3+ years of Python experience working with big-data ', 'Company Description', 'Strong understanding of ML data pipelines, from defining, collecting to crafting ground truth and training/testing data sets for ML models ', 'Master’s or PhD Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related quantitative field ', 'Minimum of 5 years of experience in data science with proven experience leading a team of Data Scientists 3+ years of Python experience working with big-data Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms, and data mining Experience in developing state-of-the-art data science techniques for large-scale machine learning products Strong understanding of ML data pipelines, from defining, collecting to crafting ground truth and training/testing data sets for ML models ', 'Create and own overall ML model and system evaluation datasets, methodology, process and frameworks ', 'Job Description</strongMcD Tech Labs is the recently established Silicon Valley based technology development group within McDonald’s Corporation. Our mission is to deliver advanced technology solutions that address real-world, data-driven needs in the McDonald’s Restaurant environment. We are focused on using state-of-the-art Machine Learning, AI, and related technologies along with McDonald’s unparalleled scale to completely transform the customer experience!We are currently looking for a talented data scientist to work with technology, engineering, and other data scientists to define success of machine learning software and help establish our ML evaluation team at McD Tech Labs. You will be tasked with defining how we evaluate quality of our machine learning algorithms and models that operate with petabyte-scale worth of customer interaction data. What evaluation data sets make sense? How do we craft and curate such data sets? What data mining techniques and systems are necessary to identify such data across diverse regions and stores worldwide?The ideal candidate will have previous experience using advanced analytics techniques and creating ML models to tackle diverse and large-scale ML data challenges.ResponsibilitiesWork with teams of data scientists in the ML evaluation work of our AI Drive Through Product Collaborate with technology, engineering, and other data science team leaders to define success of machine learning software development lifecycle. Create and own overall ML model and system evaluation datasets, methodology, process and frameworks Craft test cases and regressions suites for ML models operating at petabyte scale. Employ data mining and statistical techniques to tackle diverse and large-scale ML data challenges. Provide cross-functional teams and leadership with regular updates and strategic guidance regarding ML model quality through evaluation test framework Qualifications</strongMaster’s or PhD Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related quantitative field Minimum of 5 years of experience in data science with proven experience leading a team of Data Scientists 3+ years of Python experience working with big-data Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms, and data mining Experience in developing state-of-the-art data science techniques for large-scale machine learning products Strong understanding of ML data pipelines, from defining, collecting to crafting ground truth and training/testing data sets for ML models Demonstrated ability to facilitate and coordinate complex data design and development activities across teams in agile sprints with minimal direction Additional Information</strongAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'Additional Information</strongAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'Work with teams of data scientists in the ML evaluation work of our AI Drive Through Product ', 'Employ data mining and statistical techniques to tackle diverse and large-scale ML data challenges. ', 'Demonstrated ability to facilitate and coordinate complex data design and development activities across teams in agile sprints with minimal direction ', 'Work with teams of data scientists in the ML evaluation work of our AI Drive Through Product Collaborate with technology, engineering, and other data science team leaders to define success of machine learning software development lifecycle. Create and own overall ML model and system evaluation datasets, methodology, process and frameworks Craft test cases and regressions suites for ML models operating at petabyte scale. Employ data mining and statistical techniques to tackle diverse and large-scale ML data challenges. ', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience in developing state-of-the-art data science techniques for large-scale machine learning products ', 'Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms, and data mining ', 'Provide cross-functional teams and leadership with regular updates and strategic guidance regarding ML model quality through evaluation test framework ', 'Minimum of 5 years of experience in data science with proven experience leading a team of Data Scientists ', 'Qualifications</strongMaster’s or PhD Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related quantitative field Minimum of 5 years of experience in data science with proven experience leading a team of Data Scientists 3+ years of Python experience working with big-data Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms, and data mining Experience in developing state-of-the-art data science techniques for large-scale machine learning products Strong understanding of ML data pipelines, from defining, collecting to crafting ground truth and training/testing data sets for ML models Demonstrated ability to facilitate and coordinate complex data design and development activities across teams in agile sprints with minimal direction Additional Information</strongAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'Craft test cases and regressions suites for ML models operating at petabyte scale. ', 'Collaborate with technology, engineering, and other data science team leaders to define success of machine learning software development lifecycle. ']

And we’re looking for passionate, proactive, strategic, and creative problem-solvers to join us, specifically as an Analytics Engineer, to join our growing team.', 'Work with engineering team to diagnose and fix data discrepancies and maintain transparent code to ensure business requirements and consistent ETL logic', 'Build self-serve modules for data needs', 'Provide consistent, accurate and timely reporting', 'Perform diagnostic analysis of varied data to identify issues and promote opportunities for improvement', 'Create and maintain reporting and dashboards using SQL to deliver insightsDevelop actionable insights through the rigorous assessment of multiple data sourcesSupport and contribute to the analytics layer of our team’s data environment to make data standardized and easily accessible to end usersPerform diagnostic analysis of varied data to identify issues and promote opportunities for improvementDesign, monitor and evaluate marketing testsCollaborate with stakeholders in our marketing, planning, digital product, and finance & operations departments to define business questions and identify opportunities for data-driven improvementsProvide consistent, accurate and timely reportingBuild self-serve modules for data needsReview and validate customer data (transactions, marketing platforms, purchase flow, etc.)Work with engineering team to diagnose and fix data discrepancies and maintain transparent code to ensure business requirements and consistent ETL logicIntegrate new data sources and build ingestion pipelines for our data warehouse', 'Knowledge of data warehousing best practices', 'Create and maintain reporting and dashboards using SQL to deliver insights', 'Develop actionable insights through the rigorous assessment of multiple data sources', 'Design, monitor and evaluate marketing tests', 'Responsibilities:', 'Working knowledge with Amazon Web Services (inc. EC2, S3, Lambda)', 'Experience working with transaction/user-level data in retail/ eCommerce', 'Review and validate customer data (transactions, marketing platforms, purchase flow, etc.)', 'Excellent communication skills—being someone who values building relationships with colleagues and enjoys explaining complex topics in simple terms', 'Required Responsibilities:', 'Masters and/or MBA a plus', 'Experience working with digital marketing data', 'As an Analytics Engineer, you will take ownership of all analyses and reporting to drive the business forward. This role will be pivotal in working with senior stakeholders, providing key insights quickly, and impacting the business meaningfully.']

', 'Streamline ETL’s into coherent views to support effective and consistent reporting to the business.', 'Purpose', "The Predictive Index participates in E-Verify. Build historical datasets to eventually leverage them into data science investigations. Work closely with the systems team to understand and develop expertise in a growing range of PI data sources and their applications across the business. Staying up to date on the data lineage is critical. Constitute rules of engagement and governance processes regarding the analytics data landscape. Support and train team members on data architecture and similar concepts. ', 'Experience building schema to scale and automate workflows.', 'Work closely with the systems team to understand and develop expertise in a growing range of PI data sources and their applications across the business. Staying up to date on the data lineage is critical.', 'Drive', 'Energy', ' Experience building schema to scale and automate workflows. Experience and knowledge of modern data stores, pipeline and reporting/analytic techniques and tools. Experience building data models and data warehouses is highly desired. Expertise in SQL, MYSQL, Python, and/or R is preferred.  Strong analytical skills: Ability to collect, organize, and analyze data; summarize findings and develop conclusions and recommendations. Self-starter who takes initiative and is proactive and able to prioritize multiple projects involving various stakeholders by meeting deadlines and proactively communicating status updates. Ability to communicate at all levels of the organization, from end-users to Senior Management. Bachelor’s degree in engineering, mathematics, computer science, or equivalent data engineering work experience, preferred ', 'Experience and knowledge of modern data stores, pipeline and reporting/analytic techniques and tools.', 'Self-starter who takes initiative and is proactive and able to prioritize multiple projects involving various stakeholders by meeting deadlines and proactively communicating status updates.']

['', 'We are looking for a computational biologist or software engineer with a sustained track record of success in developing and maintaining large-scale software applications to address complex scientific data challenges.This position requires a Ph.D. or Master’s degree with 4+ years of relevant experience in the computer sciences, bioinformatics, or a scientific field of study such as Biology, Chemistry, or Biochemistry. Exceptional candidates without an advanced degree but with a demonstrated history of equivalent relevant experience are encouraged to apply.A working knowledge of both Python and R, with a mastery of either or both languages, is required.Knowledge of containerization, RESTful web service development and relational database design are highly desired; familiarity with PHP is a plus.Experience developing scientific algorithms, with basic biological concepts, research laboratory data and familiarity with the analysis of proteomic data are highly desired.Familiarity with modern software engineering best practices, including iterative/agile development, scientific software development lifecycles, version control, troubleshooting and testing is a must, as is the ability to make project decisions independently.Experience in and knowledge of semantic web concepts, including ontologies and data modeling, is a plus.', 'Research Informatics COMPANY/DIVISION', 'JOB TYPE', 'Who We Are', 'Knowledge of containerization, RESTful web service development and relational database design are highly desired; familiarity with PHP is a plus.', 'SCHEDULE', 'This position requires a Ph.D. or Master’s degree with 4+ years of relevant experience in the computer sciences, bioinformatics, or a scientific field of study such as Biology, Chemistry, or Biochemistry. Exceptional candidates without an advanced degree but with a demonstrated history of equivalent relevant experience are encouraged to apply.', 'A working knowledge of both Python and R, with a mastery of either or both languages, is required.', 'Job Facts', 'Experience developing scientific algorithms, with basic biological concepts, research laboratory data and familiarity with the analysis of proteomic data are highly desired.', 'Familiarity with modern software engineering best practices, including iterative/agile development, scientific software development lifecycles, version control, troubleshooting and testing is a must, as is the ability to make project decisions independently.', 'Experience in and knowledge of semantic web concepts, including ontologies and data modeling, is a plus.', 'The Position', 'We are looking for a computational biologist or software engineer with a sustained track record of success in developing and maintaining large-scale software applications to address complex scientific data challenges.', 'JOB FUNCTION']

', '\xa0 ', 'Build various high-quality data visualizations in Tableau to tell the story and let the data speak for itself. ', 'Knowledge of Tableau best practices in performance tuning and user-centric design, proactive alerts. ', 'Work closely with executive stakeholders and product owners to understand, capture, document, and analyze requirements for complex data solutions in Tableau. ', 'Essential Functions and Job Responsibilities: ', 'Strong decision making, critical thinking, troubleshooting, and problem-solving skills. ', 'Complete assigned compliance training and other educational programs as required. ', 'Detail oriented with strong multi-tasking and time management skills. ', '\xa0', 'The Analytics Solutions Engineer is responsible for generating insights and creating dashboards that will guide business excellence for our users. Responsible for gathering customer insights, mine data, translate insights and requirements to valuable and user-friendly output, and make recommendations about findings. Also, excellent analytical abilities, outstanding business acumen and judgement, intense curiosity, strong technical skills, and solid communication. He/she will be a self-starter, comfortable with ambiguity, able to think big and be creative (while paying careful attention to detail) and will enjoy working in a fast-paced dynamic environment. ', 'Experience building measures and metrics. ', 'Ability to work within existing dashboards and work on bugs/upgrades. Work with team-based deliveries in an agile environment. ['', 'You’ll work with a rock star engineering team that’s passionate about building the first study startup platform of its kind for our pharmaceutical clients. ['', 'In addition,', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience supporting data science activities using FAIR data management and reproducible practices.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiar with a popular high-level language used in data science, such as Python or R.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Demonstrated ability to lead heterogeneous engineering teams and interface with domain experts and users.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You are pragmatic about the tradeoffs between features, quality, and timeliness.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You are able to perform at a high level in a fast changing and demanding environment.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Plan and prioritize complex scientific software projects in conjunction with collaborators, steering committees and other stakeholders.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with formal build/release/deploy and continuous integration frameworks (e.g., Jenkins) is a plus.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You are enthusiastic about working in a scientific environment, especially one that is related to drug discovery and development.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with business analysts, computational scientists, and other\xa0software engineers to understand and conceptualize the complex, emerging needs of our scientists, whether they are working at the keyboard or the bench.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BS or higher in bioinformatics, computer science or related field.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Biological domain knowledge and basic data analysis skills are desirable but not required.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa05+ years’ experience (including any graduate school) developing tools for data analysis. Seniority of position will depend on experience and other factors.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Adept at object-oriented programming, with proficiency in R, Python, C++ or Java.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Demonstrated adherence to best practices in software engineering, particularly usability, version control, testing, and appropriate use of abstraction.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Contribute to the broader scientific community through open-source software development.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Effectively communicate strategies, ideas, goals and progress to departmental, cross-functional and senior management.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You are attracted by the challenges of developing software that solves universal problems in bioinformatics.', 'Responsibilities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborate with local and off-shore engineering teams to support your software development efforts.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Demonstrated ability to effectively communicate about complex bioinformatics problems to peers, users and leadership.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with\xa0genomics and BioConductor packages and data structures are a plus.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You are a quick learner, are curious about new areas and the opportunity to build expertise, and courageously and creatively take initiative to see your ideas implemented.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Expertise in operating on large data, such as data stored in relational and non-relational databases, array stores, HDF5 files or parquet files.', 'Note: Targeting a software engineering background, not data scientist. : if you have strong software engineering and R background and some technical domain knowledge in biology, you will be a strong fit', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaboratively and pragmatically solve scientific software engineering challenges encountered at the forefront of genomics, particularly those related to the interactive visualization and analysis of large, multi-omics datasets for both bench and computational scientists.\xa0', '\xa0', 'Requirements']

['', 'Use data-driven methods to form opinions and make informed decisions on our technical architecture', "BS degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience.5+ years of Software Development experience.Experience working with full stack web application development and cross-platform mobile application development in a team environment.Strong understanding of complex native mobile applications to help set the direction for mobile as we scale.Ability to write code that is well structured, idiomatic, reusable, and easy to understand.Interest and ability to learn coding languages, best practices and new technologies.Excellent communicator: expert in explaining technical problems in person and in writingCurious Team Player: you're excited to learn, collaborate, and teach the team on new concepts.User-Obsessed: you're driven by delivering value to our end-user and willing to listen and learn from them directly as you evaluate technical trade-offsTake pride in executing and delivering independently, assume responsibility and ownership of your code", 'We are looking for an entrepreneurial engineer who is energized by our mission and excited to make autonomous technical decisions as we continue to grow. ['', 'Collaborate cross-functionally with engineers, product managers, and data teams to deliver strategies that impact Ro’s business and platforms', 'As one of your most senior Data Scientists on the team, you’ll be owning and leading projects from start to finish, working closely with internal teams (both data and non-data savvy) to deliver optimized, scalable solutions. We are looking for someone who is motivated to strive for analytical excellence, working on unique high impact problems from teams across Ro’s business. You’re a data-hungry leader with strong technical and statistical aptitude, bringing knowledge around machine learning, modeling, dashboarding, and metrics', 'Healthcare and Dependent Care FSA', '401(k)', 'Strong technical and analytical depth with statistical tools and languages such as Python, SQL, R, Hadoop, Pandas, and BigQuery', 'A passion for big data and healthcare, with a desire to make meaningful contributions with high impact', 'About Ro', 'Values of building strong relationships with others through education, communication, and respect', 'Unlimited PTO', 'Advise stakeholders and advocate for data science best practices and actionable insights', 'Create and streamline workflows around analytics, dashboarding and metrics to identify user journeys and the effectiveness of product empathy', 'An ability to identify and execute loosely defined, complex problems and translate into practical, actionable insights to guide business decisions', 'Founded in 2017, Ro is a patient-driven telehealth company that puts you in control of your health. We’re patients, just like you, building technology to make healthcare accessible, affordable, and maybe even enjoyable. Ro powers three digital health clinics -- Roman for men’s health, Rory for women’s health, and Zero for fighting smoking addiction -- as well as Ro Pharmacy, a simple and affordable online pharmacy where every medication is $5 per month. The company’s nationwide networking of physicians and pharmacies provides a personalized, end-to-end healthcare experience from online treatment to the delivery of medication and ongoing care. Ro was named #2 in Wellness on Fast Company’s 2019 list of the World’s Most Innovative Companies, and listed by Inc. Magazine as a Best Place to Work in 2020.', 'Full medical, dental, and vision insurance + OneMedical membership', 'A passion for big data and healthcare, with a desire to make meaningful contributions ['', 'As part of being a backend engineer, you’ll use a variety of programming languages and technologies to scale our platform to handle terabytes of data being ingested across a variety of data sources.\xa0You will work on a wide range of complex challenges, including building a sophisticated sharing model, processing streams of data from multiple sources, efficiently notifying users on data matching specified criteria, and optimize queries to serve search results quickly. Our stack is constantly evolving but based on the foundations of Python, Django, Celery, Airflow, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, Neo4J, AWS, Terraform, and Ansible.', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systems', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systems', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systemsStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing\xa0people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'The Backend Software Engineer Role:', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'What We Look For:', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'About Us:', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systemsShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across one of our stacks.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'Our Team:', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.', 'About You:', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.\xa0']

['', 'Job Description', 'Proven capability to effectively communicate and provide technical assistance to 3rd party vendors', "Bachelor's degree (Computer Science, Software Engineering, or Computer Engineering is preferred)", 'Must be a US Citizen', 'Proficiency in repositories like Git, Nexus, Artifactory', "  Must be a US Citizen   Must be Top-Secret Clearance eligible   Bachelor's degree (Computer Science, Software Engineering, or Computer Engineering is preferred)  Proficiency in designing, developing, debugging, deploying, monitoring, and supporting cloud native applications that closely integrate with 3rd party vendors Proficiency with AWS, Azure, GCP and deployment of Docker Containers, Kubernetes Clusters, and Helm Deployments Proven capability creating custom Docker Images, Kubernetes YAMLs, and Helm Charts Familiarity with private Docker repositories and private Helm chart repositories Proficiency in repositories like Git, Nexus, Artifactory Proven capability building CI/CD pipelines using GitLab Proficiency in one or more scripting languages such as Java, Python, Bash, or JavaScript Proven capability to independently develop creative solutions to complex technical problems Proven capability to effectively communicate and provide technical assistance to 3rd party vendors ", 'Proficiency in one or more scripting languages such as Java, Python, Bash, or JavaScript', 'Experience working on intelligence or defense programs', 'The candidate is highly motivated and enthusiastic about implementing new technologies in a small team environment where deadlines are important to national security.', ' The position requires skills in DevOps and software development and commercial cloud integration. The candidate will develop software systems on cutting edge Artificial Intelligence applications that meet customer use cases for critical DoD missions. The candidate will create custom Docker Images, Kubernetes YAMLs, and Helm Charts. The work is performed in a multidisciplinary team environment in an agile project framework. ['', '-The Data Infrastructure team has solved many problems.\xa0And yet there are more open questions than closed ones.\xa0We love people who bring new ideas and show us how to make our data more powerful.', 'We’re looking for someone who:', '-Knows Spark inside and out.\xa0Optimizing Spark code and cluster configuration is second nature.\xa0You can quickly reason about and diagnose unexpected issues.', 'Rapidly growing global data intelligence firm seeks Senior Data Infrastructure Engineer.\xa0The Data Infrastructure is the factory that converts hundreds of sources of raw data on small and medium businesses (SMBs) into actionable intelligence for decision makers to provide credit, insurance and other services to SMBs.\xa0In today’s environment, where millions of SMBs in the United States are struggling, their mission has never been more important. The team synthesizes billions of records from hundreds of different data sources, identifies common businesses in these billions of records (entity resolution) and runs dozens of calculators to extract signal on each business’ growth, health and continuity risk.', '-Is driven to unlock the potential of data to positively impact the real world', 'Entity resolution is a hard problem and they’re continuously tuning our algorithms and experimenting with new methods. Data freshness and accuracy are critical.\xa0We maintain reliability and quality while operating at a large scale. The world is always changing--They’re continuously adding new data sources and calculators to provide better intelligence on SMBs', '-Constantly questions how things are done and use evidence to convince people to try different approaches', '-Prides yourself on writing highly readable, thoroughly tested code (we use PySpark)', 'You will work on:', '-Reflexively tests and measures your results', '-Thrives on small, focused and highly collaborative teams', '-You will be building and extending a sophisticated data pipeline with predictive models embedded at multiple stages.\xa0You’ll need to simultaneously balance system reliability, rigorous data quality requirements and an ambitious forward development plan.']

Creative Center is committed to driving the technology upgrade in ad-tech and creative industry, focusing on developing solutions for creative production, interpretation and optimization. If you need assistance or an accommodation, please reach out to us at usrc@tiktok.com.', 'Qualifications: ', '3. Responsible for system stability of backend service in specific areas.', '4. ', "TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. ['', 'A conviction is not an absolute bar to employment. Factors such as the age of the offense, evidence of rehabilitation, seriousness of violation, and job relatedness are considered in all employment decisions. Additionally, it’s the bank’s policy to only inquire into a candidate’s criminal history after an offer has been made. Federal law prohibits banks from employing individuals who have been convicted of, or received a pretrial diversion for, certain offenses.', 'Experience developing stream-based data pipelines like Kafka is a requirement for this position. [' ', 'Duration-thru April 2021', ' Required Skills ', ' • As a hands-on developer design, code, develop and support web applications. ', ' • 5+ years of professional experience as a web developer with the ability to demonstrate previous work experience. ', ' • Experience with a Version Control system (Git). ', '  \xa0', ' • Excellent understanding of Object-Oriented Programming concepts, design patterns, and data structures. ', 'Other duties: ', 'Location NYC', ' • At least 4 years experience with markup and layout (HTML5, CSS3). ', ' • At least 4 years experience with API integrations (REST, GraphQL). ', ' • A demonstrable understanding of MVC and MVVM patterns. ', ' • Perform quality assurance on all new code from inception through integration, staging, and production environments. ', ' • Ability to clearly communicate and work with business and technical co-workers. ', ' • Bachelor’s degree from an accredited university in a Computer Science or equivalent work experience ', ' The engineer will work on a fast-paced, collaborative team that is blending an exciting mix of technologies that will help millions of consumers save money. ', ' • Write unit level and integration level testing. ', '*****Please no Third Parties', ' • Extensive use and understanding of PHP, Javascript and Open API Specification (Swagger). ', ' • Highly organized and self-directed. Comfortable being very proactive about asking for help and feedback. ', ' • Follow standards for development of tools and experiences, with focus on performance, scalability, and reusability. ', ' • Highly collaborative in a team environment. Always happy to help others if needed. ', ' • Experience working with Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment technologies. ', ' • Experience with module bundling tools like Webpack and gulp. ', '\xa0Back End Software Engineer ', ' • At least 4 years experience with PHP. ', ' • Fluent or near-native English speaker ', ' • At least 4 years experience with Javascript, and strong experience with NodeJS. ', ' • Consistently demonstrate ownership and on time delivery. ', 'We seek a seasoned Back End Software Engineer with great skills in PHP and NodeJS, REST APIs, GraphQL, CouchDB, and MySQL. ', ' • Collaborate effectively with team members as well as UX, QE, and release engineering team. ', ' • Rapidly execute on solutions when problems or challenges have been identified. ', ' • Develop high performance REST APIs. ', ' • Eager to work in a fast-paced, high-energy team environment with aggressive deadlines and a strong work ethic ', '\xa0', ' • Comfortable working with requirements that change based on user feedback', ' • Design and develop micro-services and medium-sized applications with little direction. ', 'Pay $65', '   \xa0', ' \xa0', ' • Experience working with Docker and container orchestration. ', ' • Experience with cross-browser design and functional constraints. ', ' • At least 4 years experience with SQL and NoSQL Databases, ideally MySQL and CouchDB. ', ' • Direct experience with or exposure to testing in an Agile delivery model. ']

This belief also extends to our community, where we work to provide economic stability through quality employment opportunities and give back whenever we can.', 'Create technical documentation & training materials ', 'We have an immediate opening for a Systems Engineer (SE) at our corporate headquarters in Sparks, NV.\xa0This is an exciting opportunity for a seasoned IT generalist. job_title: Senior Data Engineer - Pipeline & Tools R&D
job_text: ['', 'Familiar with Restful APIs.', 'Experience with Artifact Repositories.', ' Deep understanding of advanced data warehousing concepts and track record of applying these concepts on the job. Ability to manage numerous requests concurrently and strategically, prioritizing when necessary. Good communication skills. Dynamic team player. A passion for technology. ', ' 5+ years of work experience with ETL, data modeling, and business intelligence big data architectures. 5+ years of experience with the Hadoop ecosystem (Map Reduce, Spark, Spark-Streaming, Oozie, Impala, etc.) and big data ecosystems (Kafka, Cassandra, etc.). Expert in at least one SQL language such as T-SQL or PL/SQL. Experience developing and managing data warehouses on a terabyte or petabyte scale. Strong experience in massively parallel processing & columnar databases. Experience working with Real-Time, Near-Real-Time streaming pipelines. Experience with Python and shell scripting. Experience working in a Linux environment. ', 'A passion for technology.', 'Deep understanding of advanced data warehousing concepts and track record of applying these concepts on the job.', 'Dynamic team player.', 'Experience in Lambda architecture.', ' The Rockstar Analytics team provide insights and actionable results to a wide variety of stakeholders across the organization in support of their decision making. We work together with several departments to design and implement streamed and batched data pipelines. We collaborate as a global team to develop cutting-edge data pipelines serving data products, data models, reports, analyses, and machine learning applications. ', 'PLUSES', 'Good communication skills.', 'Knowledge of the video game industry.', 'Ability to manage numerous requests concurrently and strategically, prioritizing when necessary.', 'Experience working in a Linux environment.', ' Experience with event processing frameworks. Experience in Lambda architecture. Experience with Java or Scala programming languages. Experience with CI/CD. Familiar with Restful APIs. Experience with Artifact Repositories. Knowledge of the video game industry. ', 'Set the standards for warehouse and schema design in massively parallel processing engines such as Hadoop and Snowflake while collaborating with analysts and data scientist in the creation of efficient data models.', 'Experience working with Real-Time, Near-Real-Time streaming pipelines.', 'Experience developing and managing data warehouses on a terabyte or petabyte scale.', 'What We Do', 'Qualifications', 'Implement and support big data tools and frameworks such as HDFS, Hive, and Impala.', 'Assist in the development of a big data platform in Hadoop using pipeline technologies such as Spark, Oozie, and more to support a variety of requirements and applications.', ' Implement and support big data tools and frameworks such as HDFS, Hive, and Impala. Implement and support streaming technologies such as Kafka and Spark-Streaming. Deliver near-real time and non-near-real-time data and applications to a team of analysts and data scientists who create insights and analytics applications for our stakeholders. Assist in the development of deployment automation and operational support strategies. Assist in the development of a big data platform in Hadoop using pipeline technologies such as Spark, Oozie, and more to support a variety of requirements and applications. Set the standards for warehouse and schema design in massively parallel processing engines such as Hadoop and Snowflake while collaborating with analysts and data scientist in the creation of efficient data models. Maintain and extend our CI/CD processes and documentation. ', 'Experience with event processing frameworks.', 'The Rockstar Analytics team provide insights and actionable results to a wide variety of stakeholders across the organization in support of their decision making.', 'Maintain and extend our CI/CD processes and documentation.', '5+ years of experience with the Hadoop ecosystem (Map Reduce, Spark, Spark-Streaming, Oozie, Impala, etc.) and big data ecosystems (Kafka, Cassandra, etc.).', 'Experience with CI/CD.', 'Deliver near-real time and non-near-real-time data and applications to a team of analysts and data scientists who create insights and analytics applications for our stakeholders.', 'Skills', 'Assist in the development of deployment automation and operational support strategies.', 'Experience with Python and shell scripting.', 'Strong experience in massively parallel processing & columnar databases.', 'Experience with Java or Scala programming languages.', 'Responsibilities', 'We work together with several departments to design and implement streamed and batched data pipelines.', 'How To Apply', '5+ years of work experience with ETL, data modeling, and business intelligence big data architectures.', 'Expert in at least one SQL language such as T-SQL or PL/SQL.', 'We collaborate as a global team to develop cutting-edge data pipelines serving data products, data models, reports, analyses, and machine learning applications.', 'Implement and support streaming technologies such as Kafka and Spark-Streaming.']

['', 'Building Cool Stuff:', 'We offer a competitive salary and equity opportunity for strong performers.', 'You have experience in a professional software development environment, with a degree in Computer Science or years of equivalent experienceYou have great communication skills and can collaborate closely with product managers and designers to help scope work, set priorities, and facilitate technical discussionYou have demonstrated proficiency in a modern front-end framework (such as React JS) and a backend web framework (such as Ruby on Rails)You have familiarity with an end-to-end testing framework (such as RSpec or Cypress)You are comfortable working with SQL and have basic DB performance knowledge', 'Building Cool Stuff: Our Senior Software Engineer will collaborate with Product Managers, UX Designers, and other engineers to develop new features for both our consumer-facing and client-facing web apps.Writing Thoughtful Code: Writing clean, maintainable, and well-tested code should be second nature to our team, ensuring platform stability now and more easily expanding the product in the future.Sharing Expertise: Our Senior Software Engineer should feel comfortable discussing technical decisions with fellow team members, performing code reviews, and providing mentorship for junior developers.Looking for Improvements: Our team is always on the lookout for improvements, such as possible performance gains or better coding style, and are comfortable suggesting them.', 'What’s In It For You:', 'About This Opportunity:', 'Writing Thoughtful Code:', 'Popmenu is a rapidly growing, venture-backed SaaS business in the restaurant/hospitality sector with millions of users each month. We help restaurants take real-time control of their menu and turn it into an essential tool for attracting and engaging guests. We are helping drive the future of restaurant guest engagement by taking a revolutionary approach with our patent-pending, cloud-based, dynamic, interactive platform.\xa0', ' We hire exceptionally bright, motivated people who are passionate about helping great restaurants reach their full potential. We offer a flexible work environment, a pioneering concept, a product our clients love, and talented teammates. This is a chance to make great things happen and truly be a difference maker which includes meaningful equity opportunity for long-term performers.', 'Bottom line - in this role it is your responsibility to bring an innovative product vision to life, while balancing speed and maintainability as our platform continues to grow.', 'We’re early enough that you can make significant contributions to the company’s success, but have enough in place already that you won’t have to create everything from scratch.', 'Looking for Improvements: Our team is always on the lookout for improvements, such as possible performance gains or better coding style, and are comfortable suggesting them.', 'Popmenu is looking for a Senior Software Engineer to help us continue building innovative online experiences for restaurant owners and their customers. Our ideal candidate would utilize both their React & Ruby on Rails skills to expand our awesome product and help scale our technology into the big leagues as we enter the next phase of our rapidly growing company.', 'We work with extreme agility and fluidity, and need your help improving that velocity as we scale up smartly. You can have a major impact on how our processes take shape to achieve our goals.', 'You have demonstrated proficiency in a modern front-end framework (such as React JS) and a backend web framework (such as Ruby on Rails)', 'What You Will Be Responsible For:', 'You will work with and learn from a team that is experienced in developing products that have been utilized by millions of users and tens of thousands of clients on a monthly basis', 'We offer a competitive salary and equity opportunity for strong performers.Flexibility and freedom are high. We work from home often. We care about results above all else.We’re early enough that you can make significant contributions to the company’s success, but have enough in place already that you won’t have to create everything from scratch.We work with extreme agility and fluidity, and need your help improving that velocity as we scale up smartly. Here you are expected to fail fast, fail smartly and fail forward. You’ll have tremendous leeway in trying out your ideas, no matter how speculative.We have a great culture and environment that emphasizes collaboration, energy and openness above corporate formality. You can be yourself.', 'To find great ideas you have to break some stuff. Here you are expected to fail fast, fail smartly and fail forward. You’ll have tremendous leeway in trying out your ideas, no matter how speculative.', 'We have a great culture and environment that emphasizes collaboration, energy and openness above corporate formality. Do you want to build a product that your friends and family can use on a daily basis? Do you want to work with cutting-edge technology? Are you passionate about building simple, user-friendly software that solves complex problems? ['', 'Minimum of 3 years’ experience writing production code for the web', 'Good verbal and written communication skills, including sometimes communicating with VP-level executives', 'Proven track record of delivering on your commitments and communicating risks', 'Ability to work well under pressure, handling multiple tasks and balancing multiple objectives, while consistently ensuring that the highest priority objectives are met', 'Develop great, high-quality features for multiple websitesIdentify multiple solutions to medium and large size problems and advocate for the one you think is bestServe as a technical lead on multi-sprint initiativesAssisting in the definition of “fast” for our websites and defining how we get there and stay thereCollaborate with a cross functional team of talented people that is thoughtful, inclusive, respectful of each other, and that tackles hard problemsOwn your deliverables and ensure we continue to ship scalable, highly-available products that delight our readersShare your knowledge and learnings in order to help the rest of the teamHelp establish and maintain the technical vision for products and overall technical quality, including reduction of technical debtAssist product & project management with requirement gathering and planning out phases, tasks and dependencies', 'Develop great, high-quality features for multiple websites', 'Enthusiasm for Agile principles and values', 'About PMC', 'Penske Media Corporation (PMC) is a leading digital media and information services company whose award-winning content attracts a monthly audience of more than 180 million. ['', 'We’re looking for a self-motivated, highly driven Senior Software Engineer to bolster our development team. Our team is focused on building applications to facilitate and support a new communication channel for marketers.', 'You at Attentive', 'Our backend is Java and Python microservices coupled with DynamoDB, Kinesis, AirFlow, MySql, Postgres, and Redis. Our frontend is built on current best practices leveraging Babel, Webpack, React, and Redux.Our team is 100+ engineers, product managers and designers from top tech companies including Google, Microsoft, Twitter, Moat, Oscar and AppNexus.\xa0We believe our company will win in the long run through product innovation. To get there, we obsess over iteratively delivering customer value through rapid prototyping and data driven decision making.', 'We work with 2,000+ of the most innovative brands like Sephora, Coach, Urban Outfitters, CB2, PacSun, Lulus, and Jack in the Box. Attentive was founded in 2016 by the co-founders of TapCommerce, a mobile marketing platform that was acquired by Twitter in 2014.', 'You are excited by new technologies but are conscious of choosing them for the right reasons.', 'Attentive is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We’re committed to diversity and maintaining a work environment that is free from harassment and discrimination. We’re committed to them because our core values demand it. Values like Integrity First, Listening & Cultivating Discussion, and Default to Action. Applicants from all backgrounds are encouraged to apply, and will not be discriminated\xa0against on the basis of any protected status under federal, state, or local law.', 'You have a proven track record of building applications that maintain a high bar of quality.', 'Regular company-wide social events (even virtually!)', 'Our backend is Java and Python microservices coupled with DynamoDB, Kinesis, AirFlow, MySql, Postgres, and Redis. Our frontend is built on current best practices leveraging Babel, Webpack, React, and Redux.', 'Our team is 100+ engineers, product managers and designers from top tech companies including Google, Microsoft, Twitter, Moat, Oscar and AppNexus.\xa0', 'Robust health benefits packages including access to a 401k and various medical, dental and vision plans, and $100/month fitness reimbursementFull support for remote workDaily lunch delivery credit and other goodies sent to homeRegular company-wide social events (even virtually!)Generous annual education stipend toward job-related external learning opportunitiesAn extremely enthusiastic team that appreciates collaboration\xa0', 'Robust health benefits packages including access to a 401k and various medical, dental and vision plans, and $100/month fitness reimbursement', 'Benefits & Perks', 'You have worked professionally with web technologies for 5+ years with experience on a single application long enough to see the consequences of your decisions.You have a proven track record of building applications that maintain a high bar of quality.You understand how to negotiate with Product Management to meet the user’s needs without sacrificing quality or accruing tech debt. You deeply loathe regressions and take proactive steps to protect against them through a variety of testing techniques.You are excited by new technologies but are conscious of choosing them for the right reasons.You are constantly improving the quality of the project you are working on, both via code contributions as well as long-term advocacy for larger scale changes.You are enthusiastic about the high impact, fast-paced work environment of an early stage startup', 'Generous annual education stipend toward job-related external learning opportunities', 'Full support for remote work', 'You understand how to negotiate with Product Management to meet the user’s needs without sacrificing quality or accruing tech debt. You deeply loathe regressions and take proactive steps to protect against them through a variety of testing techniques.', 'We believe our company will win in the long run through product innovation. To get there, we obsess over iteratively delivering customer value through rapid prototyping and data driven decision making.', 'Attentive is a personalized text messaging platform changing the way consumers interact with businesses and organizations. The company is one of the fastest growing startups in New York City and recently raised a $230 million investment led by Coatue in September 2020, just 5 months after its Series C round due to strong customer traction. Other investors in Attentive include Bain Capital Ventures, Sequoia, IVP.\xa0\xa0', 'An extremely enthusiastic team that appreciates collaboration\xa0', 'About Attentive:\xa0', 'You have worked professionally with web technologies for 5+ years with experience on a single application long enough to see the consequences of your decisions.', 'You are enthusiastic about the high impact, fast-paced work environment of an early stage startup', 'Role Background:', 'You are constantly improving the quality of the project you are working on, both via code contributions as well as long-term advocacy for larger scale changes.', 'Daily lunch delivery credit and other goodies sent to home', 'Product Development at Attentive']

', 'Experience building/consuming REST web services', ' Retirement Plan', 'Spark or Pyspark experience preferred', 'You will enjoy working with a highly talented and diverse team of data scientists and engineers specializing in deep learning, active learning, and classical machine learning on one of the richest data sets in US healthcare. ', 'Extensive experience building UI applications using React', ' Comprehensive Medical Benefits', ' Competitive Pay, 401K', "You'll be equipped with nearly limitless cloud compute resources and be expected to deliver business impact through implementation of a large pipeline of AI models.", 'Above average capabilities with cloud computing techniques or tools such as S3, EC2, EMR, SageMaker, ECS, Lambda, IAM', ' Experience building automated processes that are supportable, monitored, and enterprise-scale Extensive experience building UI applications using React Experience working with and integrating services from popular ML packages such as Keras, TensorFlow, XGBoost, SciKit Learn Above average capabilities with cloud computing techniques or tools such as S3, EC2, EMR, SageMaker, ECS, Lambda, IAM SQL design and development skills ', " The Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning (AI / ML) Software Engineer will be responsible for supporting Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Data Science solutions.  We’re looking for engineers with a passion for Artificial Intelligence to help drive a new generation of data and machine learning enabled services and products to impact healthcare. You will enjoy working with a highly talented and diverse team of data scientists and engineers specializing in deep learning, active learning, and classical machine learning on one of the richest data sets in US healthcare.  You'll be equipped with nearly limitless cloud compute resources and be expected to deliver business impact through implementation of a large pipeline of AI models. The ideal candidate will have a background in Python, have experience working with large data sets, and have experience in building and deploying data-driven solutions.  You are focused on results, a self-starter, able to put the team-first, and have demonstrated success in using data science to develop and deploy solutions with a focus on impact. Provide technical leadership and implementation for Software Engineering projects supporting our AI and machine learning goals Modifies, implements, tests, and supports all product related technology and functionality, including software infrastructure in an AWS hosted environment Demonstrates strong drive to learn and advocate for development best practices (TDD, code reviews, continuous integration, etc.) Communicates proactively and effectively with team members and other product stakeholders in a highly Agile environment Self-starter that will take tasks and accomplish them with little oversight according to timelines and budgets agreed upon with business and technology stakeholders ", 'Duration:', ':', 'Provide technical leadership and implementation for Software Engineering projects supporting our AI and machine learning goals', 'SQL design and development skills', 'Responsibilities', 'The ideal candidate will have a background in Python, have experience working with large data sets, and have experience in building and deploying data-driven solutions. ', 'Our Benefits Package Includes', 'Demonstrated initiative with learning new technologies', 'You have 2+ years’ experience working on applications of machine learning with strong to expert ability in Python as a primary language', 'Location', 'Overview']

['We own and manage the data stack, consisting of Segment, Fivetran, Stitch, Dataform, BigQuery and Looker. In addition to technical leadership, we partner across departments to raise the analytics bar, drive operational improvement, and support growth.\xa0', 'A Strong Process Owner & Communicator: You possess the ability to fluidly translate business questions to technical specs/data products and explain the process/outputs to non-technical audiences', 'Experienced working with media and or other content-related analytics', 'Create clean, intuitive datasets for use in analytics/reporting, product and business operations\xa0', 'About the Team:', 'Experienced transforming data in modeling tools such as dbt, Dataform or LookML, and working with a cloud-based data warehouse (BigQuery/GCP experience a plus)', 'Collaborative: You possess the ability to partner smoothly with engineering teams to design, implement and test data infrastructure, and with business users to support data-driven outcomes', 'Be a key data owner for a strategic pillar of our business.\xa0Partner with Content, Product and Engineering to ensure tracking, pipelines and modeling meet business needs and technical best practices.\xa0Create clean, intuitive datasets for use in analytics/reporting, product and business operations\xa0Scale data’s impact by onboarding business users to LookerBuild mission critical analyses and reportingBe a key partner in building a high-performing data org by sharing knowledge and creating documentation that helps us scalePlay a central role in scaling data’s impact at AlphaSense from a technical, operations\xa0and enablement perspective', 'Content is at the heart of AlphaSense’s value to our users. In this high-impact role, you’ll be a technical and business partner to Content, working across Product and Engineering to build data infrastructure, process and data products that help AlphaSense scale.\xa0', 'Scale data’s impact by onboarding business users to Looker', 'The BI & Analytics team works across AlphaSense to make data an asset for growth. We do that through infrastructure, process, well-modeled and documented data, analysis, and deep partnership with the business.\xa0', 'Be a key partner in building a high-performing data org by sharing knowledge and creating documentation that helps us scale', 'About the Role:', 'Be a key data owner for a strategic pillar of our business.\xa0', 'AlphaSense is a search engine for market intelligence that transforms how decisions are made by the world’s leading corporations and financial institutions. Leveraging AI and NLP technology, AlphaSense enables knowledge professionals to extract insights in seconds from thousands of disparate data sources, including company filings, event transcripts, news and trade journals, and equity research. Founded in 2011 and backed by investors including Innovation Endeavors and Soros Fund Management, AlphaSense is on a mission to empower organizations to make data-driven decisions with confidence.', 'You’ll be responsible for delivering data and insights that inform product and content strategy and business decisions. You’ll also take a lead role in designing tracking/infrastructure improvements and partnering with Engineering to implement.\xa0', 'Play a central role in scaling data’s impact at AlphaSense from a technical, operations\xa0and enablement perspective', 'Our work spans BI dashboards for business and exec. users, ML models for retention forecasting, and data & infrastructure to support our AI engineers. We are looking for a curious, collaborative, and high-output data pro to join our team.', 'What You’ll Do:', 'Partner with Content, Product and Engineering to ensure tracking, pipelines and modeling meet business needs and technical best practices.\xa0', 'About AlphaSense:', 'Experienced building in a modern BI platform (Looker a strong plus), and training business users to self-serve', 'You possess a deep curiosity and tenacity to understand data and business questions', '\xa0', 'Growth oriented: You thrive in fast paced environments, have a ‘whatever it takes’ mentality and are eager to help us scale our business.', 'Who You Are:', 'Passionate About Data: You are an expert in SQL and have a passion for the ‘modern data stack’ (ie: ingest and transformation tools, cloud based DWH and BI). You have several years of experience in a hands-on data role, with some experience as a data owner for a department', 'Build mission critical analyses and reporting', 'Passionate About Data: You are an expert in SQL and have a passion for the ‘modern data stack’ (ie: ingest and transformation tools, cloud based DWH and BI). You have several years of experience in a hands-on data role, with some experience as a data owner for a departmentGrowth oriented: You thrive in fast paced environments, have a ‘whatever it takes’ mentality and are eager to help us scale our business.A Strong Process Owner & Communicator: You possess the ability to fluidly translate business questions to technical specs/data products and explain the process/outputs to non-technical audiencesCollaborative: You possess the ability to partner smoothly with engineering teams to design, implement and test data infrastructure, and with business users to support data-driven outcomesExperienced transforming data in modeling tools such as dbt, Dataform or LookML, and working with a cloud-based data warehouse (BigQuery/GCP experience a plus)Experienced working with media and or other content-related analyticsExperienced building in a modern BI platform (Looker a strong plus), and training business users to self-serveYou possess a deep curiosity and tenacity to understand data and business questions']

['', 'Requirements:', 'Perform code reviews regularly', 'Knowledge of SQL and Linux', 'Troubleshoot production issue', 'Work with your team and product management to design new features and architectural improvements to the SSP backend systems.', '3+ years of experience working with Java EE', '3+ years of experience working with Restful web services', 'Design, code and test backend Java applications and services.', 'Design, build and maintain SSP ad serving systems and APIs.', 'Experience in UI frameworks like Ember and React', '6+ years of Software development and testing experience', 'Knowledge of AWS or other cloud computing environments', 'Design, build and maintain SSP ad serving systems and APIs.Design, code and test backend Java applications and services.Perform code reviews regularlyTroubleshoot production issueWork with your team and product management to design new features and architectural improvements to the SSP backend systems.', '6+ years of Software development and testing experience3+ years of experience working with Java EE3+ years of experience working with Restful web servicesKnowledge of SQL and LinuxPast experience with CI/CDWorking experience with distributed systemsKnowledge of AWS or other cloud computing environments', 'Responsibilities:', 'Experience in Ad-Tech ', 'We are the Verizon Media Video SSP engineering team responsible for end-to-end video monetization. The Video SSP features the industry’s largest open exchange, with over 40 billion impressions transacting each month. Integrations with the Verizon Media DSP, as well as 50+ third party DSPs, make it the de facto source for unique Verizon owned and operated inventory, as well as premium third-party video supply for advertisers, media agencies, and network partners.We creatively approach problems from an analytical perspective in order to embrace our complex ecosystem and deliver a scalable solution that process Billions of transactions per day while maintaining single milliseconds latency.', 'A Little About Us', 'Past experience with CI/CD', 'Working experience with distributed systems', 'Nice to Have', 'Experience in Ad-Tech Experience in UI frameworks like Ember and React', 'Verizon Media is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to, and will not be discriminated against based on age, race, gender, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, veteran status, disability or any other protected category. Verizon Media is dedicated to providing an accessible environment for all candidates during the application process and for employees during their employment. If you need accessibility assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability, please submit a request via the Accommodation Request Form (https://www.verizonmedia.com/careers/contact-us.html)\xa0or call 408-336-1409. Requests and calls received for non-disability related issues, such as following up on an application, will not receive a response.', "It takes powerful technology to connect our brands and partners with an audience of 1 billion. Nearly half of Verizon Media employees are building the code and platforms that help us achieve that. Whether you’re looking to write mobile app code, engineer the servers behind our massive ad tech stacks, or develop algorithms to help us process 4 trillion data points a day, what you do here will have a huge impact on our business—and the world. Want in? As Verizon’s media unit, our brands like Yahoo, TechCrunch and HuffPost help people stay informed and entertained, communicate and transact, while creating new ways for advertisers and partners to connect. With technologies like XR, AI, machine-learning, and 5G, we’re transforming media for tomorrow, too. We're creators and coders, dreamers and doers creating what's next in content, advertising and technology.", 'Nice to Have:']

job_text: ['', 'Scaling the crawling platform to support to millions of daily domain and single page crawls ', 'Bonus Points For', "Confidence can sometimes hold us back from applying for a job. But we'll let you in on a secret: there's no such thing as the 'perfect' candidate. HubSpot is a place where everyone can grow. So however you identify and whatever background you bring with you, please apply if this is a role that would make you excited to come into work every day.", 'Further expand our data parsing capabilities to extract more useful information and insights from web data in collaboration with our Machine Learning team', 'Can help us realize the vision of making our web crawling more powerful, reliable and highly performant for HubSpot application developers that use it to power dozens of use cases and counting.', 'Designing elegant yet practical APIs that can support dozens of use cases that need data from web crawls', ' Scaling the crawling platform to support to millions of daily domain and single page crawls  Designing elegant yet practical APIs that can support dozens of use cases that need data from web crawls Building and expanding on the distributed storage systems to efficiently persist and retrieve terabytes of information extracted from crawled web data Further expand our data parsing capabilities to extract more useful information and insights from web data in collaboration with our Machine Learning team ', "The Challenges You'll Face On The Web Crawling Platform Team Include", 'Building and expanding on the distributed storage systems to efficiently persist and retrieve terabytes of information extracted from crawled web data', 'Are interested in working with and supporting infrastructure at scale.', 'Able to demonstrate pragmatic decision making and problem-solving abilities.', 'Able to approach complicated technical problems and analyze tradeoffs with empathy for the developers, yet building creative solutions.', ' Being someone with experience on web crawling at scale. ', 'Are willing and able to work with the user base, in this case, other developers, to define and build tools that make the lives of application developers easier and their tools more reliable.', 'Being someone with experience on web crawling at scale.', ' Can help us realize the vision of making our web crawling more powerful, reliable and highly performant for HubSpot application developers that use it to power dozens of use cases and counting. Are willing and able to work with the user base, in this case, other developers, to define and build tools that make the lives of application developers easier and their tools more reliable. Are interested in working with and supporting infrastructure at scale. Able to approach complicated technical problems and analyze tradeoffs with empathy for the developers, yet building creative solutions. Able to demonstrate pragmatic decision making and problem-solving abilities. ', 'We Are Looking For People Who']

['', 'About You:\xa0', 'Education:\xa0', '• Experience with mobile platform development', 'SciPlay Corporation and its affiliates (collectively, SciPlay) are committed to creating a workforce of credibility and dependability. As a prerequisite to employment with SciPlay (to the extent permitted by law), you shall be asked to consent to SciPlay conducting a due diligence/background investigation on you. This job description should not be interpreted as all-inclusive; it is intended to identify major responsibilities and requirements of the job. The employee in this position may be requested to perform other job-related tasks and responsibilities than those stated above. SciPlay is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate against applicants due to race, color, sex, age, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, status as a veteran, and basis of disability or any other federal, state or local protected class. If you’d like more information about your equal employment opportunity rights as an applicant under the law, please click here EEOC Poster.', '• Passion for Solving Challenging Technical Problems', '• Start to develop leadership skills', '• Independent, Proactive Communicator', '• GSD (Get "Stuff" Done) Attitude', '• Active Learner and Mentor', 'Required XP:\xa0', '• Experience with micro-services', '• Ability to Mentor', 'Role Buildout:', '• Fully stocked kitchen', '• Multiple Languages / Language Agnostic / Multiple Technologies & Platforms', '• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills', '• Analytics driven development / experience', '• Engaged and Curious', '• Bachelor’s Degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Math, Statistics or relevant area or equivalent experience', '• Casual games development experience', 'We are in search of an experienced and talented Software Engineer to contribute their subject matter expertise on our title, Goldfish Slots, as well as across our Austin Studio. The ideal candidate will either be able guide themselves through Unity with their eyes closed or know the backend of a server like the back of their own hand.', '• Brand new, shiny, and aesthetically pleasing 10,000 sq ft office located in the Arboretum area in Austin', 'Preferred XP:\xa0', 'We are SciPlay! We make games!', '• Experience across multiple facets of programming (Database, Networking, Audio)', 'A few of our highlighted perks and benefits:', '• Competitive salaries and annual bonuses alongside matching 401k, employee stock options, and other competitive benefits.', 'SciPlay currently offers seven core games, including social casino games Jackpot Party Casino, Gold Fish Casino, Hot Shot Casino and Quick Hit Slots, and casual games MONOPOLY Slots, Bingo Showdown and 88 Fortunes Slots with all over the world!', 'At SciPlay, we are programmed to think untraditionally. From our yearly development conferences, shindigs, and new game launches, we believe in doing what you love and doing it well. We take great pride in our ability to create authentic experiences for players and we are excited to continue investing in our workforce, technology, and our data-driven approach, all with the mission of delighting our players long into the future. We believe that if we continue to stay passionate, set ambitious goals, live our values and play together, we will become the #1 social casino and casual gaming company in the world.', 'Knowledge, Skills, & Abilities:', '• Familiarity with Git, SVN or other version control software', '• Ability to Architect Solutions', '• Ability to prioritize tasks', 'The roots of our company are simple and strong: Our founders fell head over heels for casino games and had a vision to create the most entertaining free-to-play casino games for gamers around the world. We’ve grown into a company that makes games we are truly proud of and that are enjoyed by millions of players every day. Our history is extensive, but we’re just getting started. In 1998, we got our start as Phantom EFX and in 2019, we reintroduced ourselves as SciPlay and went public on the Nasdaq.', '• Fully stocked gameroom featuring current generation consoles and titles, shuffle board tables, foosball tables, and arcade cabinets (including our prized 5v5 cabinet ultra-rare copy of Killer Queen!)', '• Strong commitment to work/life balance', '• Adaptable and Reflective (Self-Reflection)', '• Strong Object Oriented programming skills\xa0', '• 5+ years of software experience', 'Bonus Points:\xa0', '1+ years of experience in cross-platform software architecture', 'SciPlay is a leading developer and publisher of digital games on mobile and web platforms, providing highly entertaining free-to-play games that millions of people play every day for their authenticity, engagement and fun.', '• Knowledge of C# and Unity\xa0', '• Team Oriented', '• Understand and Care about Product']
