company: UCAR - The University Corporation for Atmospheric Research
job_text: ['', 'A cover letter is required. An Inclusion Statement will be required for all applicants advancing to an in-person interview. If requested, this statement should address past efforts, as well as future vision and plans to advocate for and advance diversity, equity, and inclusion in the organization and/or field of work.  A pre-employment screening is conducted in conjunction with an offer for employment. This screening may involve verifying or reviewing any of the following relevant information: restricted parties screening, employment verification, performance records of internal candidates, education verification, reference checks, verification of professional licenses, certifications, and Motor Vehicle Records. UCAR complies with the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA). Please note that while the position description details both minimum requirements as well as desired skills and experience, we want to remind applicants that you do not need to have all the desired skills and experience to be considered for this role. If you have the passion for the work along with experience in a related field, you are encouraged to apply. We can provide on-the-job training for the rest.', 'Experience with extant “off the shelf” AI/ML toolkits and software packages', 'Experience designing and presenting educational materials (to be used as part of a parallel online training effort at Unidata)', 'Facilitate, with active community engagement, the creation of standards for storing and organizing model data and metadata in a way which lends itself to AI/ML applications', 'Familiarity with the netCDF software and data model', 'Convention Design & Development', 'Demonstrated experience with modern AI/ML concepts such as Convolution Neural Networks, Pattern Recognition algorithms, as well as more generalized concepts such as supervised and unsupervised learning models', 'Innovative and self-motivated learner', 'Creating/proposing a convention for storing and organizing model data and model metadata, with an eye towards standardization. This work will be done with input actively solicited from the broader Unidata community', 'What You Will Do', 'Participate in technical advisory committees; prepare progress reports and presentations for Unidata management', 'The ability to communicate in a professional and courteous manner', ' A pre-employment screening is conducted in conjunction with an offer for employment. This screening may involve verifying or reviewing any of the following relevant information: restricted parties screening, employment verification, performance records of internal candidates, education verification, reference checks, verification of professional licenses, certifications, and Motor Vehicle Records. UCAR complies with the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA). ', 'What You Need:', 'Experience performing independent literature review', 'Communication the current state of the Unidata AI/ML efforts to our community, in the form of blog posts, white papers, and community events (online for the foreseeable future)', 'Participate in technical advisory committees; prepare progress reports and presentations for Unidata managementFoster interactions with user community and other Unidata staff in an effort to anticipate and estimate current and future data and software needsParticipate in virtual scientific meetings through attendance, abstract submission, and presentationsContribute to funding proposals on an as-the-opportunity-arises basis', 'Bachelor’s degree in atmospheric or related sciences, mathematics or computer science with progressive, relevant experience which is typically gained by four to eight years of experience with scientific applications and scientific data services or equivalent combination of education and experience. (Master’s degree and no experience is accepted in lieu of a bachelor’s degree and above experience.)', 'Collaborate with internal and external developers to determine what changes will better enable extant Unidata software tools to work within an AI/ML framework. These changes may include adoption of cloud-based services such as serverless technology, and newer data storage technologies, such as Amazon S3/object storage', 'Desired', 'Experience working with one or more of the following: C, C++, Fortran or JavaExperience with open-source software projects and development tools, such as test-driven development, and GitHubAbility to work in a team environment in a variety of roles, including developer, community engagement, and user supportStrong ability to communicate effectively with experts across a variety of scientific domainsExperience designing and presenting educational materials (to be used as part of a parallel online training effort at Unidata)Experience contributing to the proposal process as part of a teamFamiliarity with the netCDF software and data modelFamiliarity with the Climate and Forecast (CF) Metadata Conventions', 'Strong ability to communicate effectively with experts across a variety of scientific domains', 'Experience contributing to the proposal process as part of a team', 'The University Corporation for Atmospheric Research (UCAR) is an equal opportunity/equal access/affirmative action employer that strives to develop and maintain a diverse workforce. UCAR is committed to providing equal opportunity for all employees and applicants for employment and does not discriminate on the basis of race, age, creed, color, religion, national origin or ancestry, sex, gender, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or pregnancy. ', 'Provide support to the community through open, frequent communication regarding the status of Unidata’s AI/ML efforts', 'Foster interactions with user community and other Unidata staff in an effort to anticipate and estimate current and future data and software needs', 'Whatever your intersection of identities, you are welcome at the University Corporation for Atmospheric Research (UCAR). If you have the passion for the work along with experience in a related field, you are encouraged to apply. We can provide on-the-job training for the rest.', ' An Inclusion Statement will be required for all applicants advancing to an in-person interview. If requested, this statement should address past efforts, as well as future vision and plans to advocate for and advance diversity, equity, and inclusion in the organization and/or field of work. ['', 'Familiarity with development and orchestration tools (e.g. git, gdb, DTrace, Ansible, Kubernetes)', 'Expertise in some (but not all) of the following areas:', ' ', ' The Team and Our Values', 'We are looking for disk/storage experts who love to solve scalability problems—software engineers who have a strong technical background in disk management, disk error handling, erasure coding, disk recovery, filesystems in distributed colocated and remote environments. ['', '5+ years of hands-on experience with Data Integration, Data Quality and Data Virtualization tools like Informatica\xa0PowerCenter, Informatica Data Quality and Golden Gate Replication.', "We're hiring smart thinkers and doers who want to work for a leader and innovator in the challenging, ever-changing healthcare space. Come and help us make health care better for everyone.", 'he Data Engineer Developer (Consultant) will be an integral member of the Data Services Management Team. This is a hands-on role which will be responsible for design, development, and implementation of cutting-edge sophisticated data integration, data warehouse and data mart (ELT/ETL) solutions using Netezza, Oracle, Informatica, and Denodo. An ideal candidate will have extensive knowledge of the data warehouse architecture, capabilities, system setup, data integration, data modeling concepts.', 'Design and develop reusable components, code, and document custom\xa0automation frameworks, maintain scripts, and\xa0update these items as needed to build continuous delivery pipelines, ensuring rapid availability of the product.', 'Qualifications: ', 'Hands-on experience with source version control, continuous integration, and experience with release/change management delivery tools /methodology.', 'Qualifications:', 'Experience with NOSQL databases like MongoDB, Cassandra or MarkLogic.', 'Excellent communications and client interfacing skills as with an ability to work\xa0in\xa0a highly collaborative\xa0environment. ', 'Work closely with Operations Production Support team in resolving escalated high priority incidents and the development coding issues.', 'Proven expertise in writing efficient advanced and analytical SQL and Unix shell scripts.', 'Prior experience in leading a technical team, providing technical direction and mentoring junior data\xa0integration developers.', 'Expert grasp of data warehouse design techniques including slowly changing\xa0dimensions, aggregation, partitioning and indexing strategies.\xa0', 'Experience with multiple software development lifecycles, e.g. Agile, iterative, waterfall.', 'Education:', 'Hands-on experience in Python coding and familiarity with Python libraries used in data engineering and\xa0machine learning like Pandas, NumPy etc.', 'Minimum Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or other related disciplines.', 'Experience with AI-ML tools like RapidMiner, Databricks or H20.AI.', 'The primary responsibility of this role is to support development operations, implementation, design, delivery and support of large enterprise data warehouse/BI environments, incident resolution, build reusable automation procedures and frameworks. This position requires strong collaboration with solution leads, data modelers, analysts, business partners and other developers to understand business requirements and provide appropriate data integration solutions in alignment with solution implementation architecture.', '\xa0', '8+ years of proven hands-on experience in data integration, data warehouse, BI solution design, development, and implementation.', 'Looking for a chance to do meaningful work that touches millions? Come join the hardest working, nonprofit health plan in California and help us shape the future of health care. Blue Shield of California is focused on transforming health care by making it more accessible, affordable and customer centric. Being a mission-driven organization means we do much more than serve our members: we were the first health plan in the nation to limit our annual net income to 2 percent of revenue and return the difference to our customers and the community, and since 2005 we have contributed more than $325 million to the Blue Shield of California Foundation to improve community health and end domestic violence. We’re excited to share Blue Shield of California has received awards and recognition for – LGBT diversity, quality improvement, most influential women in corporate America, Bay Area’s top companies in volunteering & giving, and one of the world’s most ethical companies. We also believe that a healthier California begins with our employees, so we provide them with resources to develop and maintain a healthy lifestyle through our award-winning wellness program, Wellvolution.', '5+ years of hands-on experience in at least one relational data source such as Oracle, SQL Server and Data warehouse MPP applications such Netezza, Teradata etc.', 'Hands-on experience in Cloudera or a similar Hadoop system and its components like Hive, HBase, Pig, Sqoop,\xa0Flume, Kafka, spark, Yarn, Impala, etc.', 'Prior experience in healthcare Payor/provider space.', 'Extensive experience in triaging data issues, analyzing end to end data pipelines and in working with business users in resolving issues.']

We also expect you to teach us a few things along the way.', 'No policy vacation policy.', 'Ranked as one of the top places to work in the Seattle area for multiple years.', 'Senior Backend Data Engineer with minimum 5+ years of experience in production level software design and development.Bachelor’s or advanced degree in computer science, mathematics, or related discipline.\xa0Solid development skills with Java, Spark, API design, big data technologies and databases like PostgreSQL, ElasticSearch, DynamoDB.Experience building and maintaining performant, fault-tolerant, scalable and distributed data and ETL pipelines.Experience with AWS technologies such as EC2, EMR, RDS, S3, Athena, LambdaCollaborative team player with ability to work across engineering & data science teamsExperience with geospatial data is usefulAbility to write high-quality code that is maintainable, clear, and concise.Enjoy working in an Agile environment.', 'NRIX has an unmatched world-wide collection of GPS data from connected cars, fleet vehicles, and mobile devices.\xa0The Analytics Team is racing to meet customer demand for new insights.\xa0Our tools provide data-driven answers to everyone’s questions about traffic, populations, and businesses.\xa0We help transportation managers measure commute times, manage congestion, and fix traffic signals.\xa0We help cities track freight movement, plan public transit, and reduce the impact of construction.\xa0We help businesses understand where their customers come from, and select the best site for their next store.\xa0', 'Collaborative team player with ability to work across engineering & data science teams', 'Competitive Salary, Benefits, and 401K matching.', 'A boat on Lake Washington. You get your license and we’ll pay for the gas.', 'Experience with geospatial data is useful', 'Enjoy working in an Agile environment.', 'INRIX is a small company that thrives on innovation with many tangible and intangible benefits that differ from some of the big companies in the area.', 'Experience with AWS technologies such as EC2, EMR, RDS, S3, Athena, Lambda', 'Bachelor’s or advanced degree in computer science, mathematics, or related discipline.\xa0', 'If you want the opportunity to build novel products, get your hard work into production, and be thanked by eager customers, INRIX is the place for you.\xa0Our product teams are empowered to work directly with customers and our strong Sales team to decide which products to build, and how to build them.\xa0Everyone makes a difference here.', 'I', 'INRIX Analytics is building and expanding several new products and needs a top-notch Senior Java Backend Developer with a focus on Data/ETL engineering.', 'Ability to write high-quality code that is maintainable, clear, and concise.', 'Who we are looking for:\xa0', '\xa0', 'Senior Backend Data Engineer with minimum 5+ years of experience in production level software design and development.', 'Why INRIX?', 'INRIX is the global leader in connected car services and smart cities, a new approach that leverages big data and the cloud to help manage urban mobility. Our products are used by the top automakers, governments, mobile operators, developers, advertisers, as well as enterprises large and small. We are literally everywhere with over 450 customers across 60 countries.', 'Why make the move:', 'Plethora of snacks and drinks, subsidized lunches, and free lunch Fridays where people are encouraged to get to know other people in the company.']

['', 'Passion for building backend technologies that have the power to positively impact millions.', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes to support hundreds of millions of records.', 'No Recruiters. This is an internal position our internal team is hiring for.', 'Qualifications: ', 'Seamless delivers the world’s best sales leads. Through our product, we help sales teams maximize revenue, increase sales, and easily acquire their total addressable market using artificial intelligence. We have been recognized as one of Ohio’s fastest growing companies and just won an award for Best Technology Company of the year in 2019 by NJTC.\xa0', 'Regularly (and often frequently) shipping quality finished code - working in an AGILE/MVP format is key.', 'The Software Engineer role will be a part of a lean, nimble, full stack powerful engineering team. We value simplicity in both our code and our UI. We don’t believe in bloated teams or overly architected solutions; we opt for small, nimble players that work well together, iterates fast and achieves more as a high-powered team. Since we’re a small team, you’ll have the opportunity to work on virtually all aspects of the software and have a direct and immediate impact! This role will advance our cutting-edge data search engine and social profiling platform. The role will build scalable backend microservices, APIs and database structures using Node / Express / Postgres, etc. We have a service-oriented architecture,\xa0 two client facing platforms, a web app, and a Chrome extension supported by around 9 other services (with an internal API to connect them). You will be at the core of every new feature, every product decision, and every touch point of our users. You will not be micromanaged and have full autonomy to design the architecture and engineer the features / products for scale. If you are a problem solver and enjoy having the ability to think creatively with your code, you would love being on this team.\xa0', 'Solve complex near real-time web engineering problems with big data.', 'We have an amazing culture and work environment that anyone would want to be a part of. We encourage a culture of positivity. We thrive off of continuous feedback and do whatever it takes to help our team and customers be successful. You will grow as an individual, professionally, and be able to see and feel the impact you are making to the growth of Seamless every day.', 'Disclaimer: This is a full-time remote position, headquartered out of Columbus, OH. We are open to assisting with relocation and willing to discuss US remote for the right candidate. Visa Sponsorship is not included in our hiring package. Applicants will need to be authorized to work in the US.', '5+ years experience building highly-available, scalable and modern Javascript web applications (full stack development experience ideal / a plus).', '5+ years experience building highly-available, scalable and modern Javascript web applications (full stack development experience ideal / a plus).Expert knowledge of modern back-end solving and complexity analysis.Strong knowledge of asynchronous programming patterns and service-oriented architecture (SOA) solutions.Experience developing internal APIs, and integrating with 3rd party APIs.Value autonomy and ownership of your work.Self-motivated engineer with the ability to work well with a small team of highly-driven / entrepreneurial Developers.', 'Experience developing internal APIs, and integrating with 3rd party APIs.', 'Design, Development, and implementation of scalable and performant backend microservices handling large quantities of concurrent requests and data (initially this role will be responsible for backend development but will also require frontend, full stack).', 'About Seamless', 'The Opportunity', 'The Seamless Family', 'Value autonomy and ownership of your work.', 'Self-motivated engineer with the ability to work well with a small team of highly-driven / entrepreneurial Developers.', 'Design, Development, and implementation of scalable ['*** This position will be located in Johnston, IA. It will start remote due to COVID, but the successful candidate is expected to be onsite once our client’s facility reopens. Candidates must be able to relocate to this location at their own expense. ***', 'Volt is seeking a Software Engineer to work onsite at John Deere’s facility in Johnston, IA. This is a contingent position forecasted for one year. If you have completed a bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering or a related IT field and have at least four years of experience with AWS Lambdas, we want to talk to you! We need someone who is highly skilled with Test Driven Development in Node.js utilizing Typescript and using linting to ensure standard code. Experience with Jenkins deployment is also highly desired. Apply today!', 'Volt is an Equal Opportunity Employer.', 'Volt provides highly skilled contingent workers to local, national and international clients in all major industries. We offer competitive compensation, the chance to work with some of the world’s leading companies, and a staff committed to helping you take the next step on your career path.', 'Must be available to work on W2 for Volt. No C2C or 3rd party vendors please.']

', ' You consider yourself to be a student of the world who thrives in an ever-changing environment that holds within it new challenges and chances to prove your expertise.', 'About The Team', ' Encouraging the project teams that you oversee to work collaboratively and to aim for insight-driven outcomes.', 'Preferred Experience', 'Outlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position. ['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Meet with other members of the solutions engineering team to discuss current projects and define and refine processes to improve our ability to deliver solutions.', 'This person will be implementing solutions exclusively for Linux systems.\xa0', "We're busy building an ultrafast and elastic data processing engine to help our clients make sense of their data and turn their data into money!\xa0", 'The Role:\xa0', 'We believe this is a $40B+ market opportunity and we aim to take a good chunk of it. We’re a seed-stage company that’s raised $6M from some of the best enterprise software investors in NYC, and we’re looking for dedicated people to grow our team and our business, enhance our culture and contribute great ideas.', 'We’re hiring for an experienced software engineer excited about joining a small, dynamic startup passionate about data engineering and distributed systems. As a solutions engineer, you will gather requirements from clients, propose solutions matched with existing technology, iteratively develop solutions with client input, and provide ongoing support. Your work will directly impact our success by delivering value to clients and developing internal processes that make it easier to scalably deliver value in the future.', 'None of these are hard requirements if someone has a proven track record implementing software and the motivation to learn, but they are useful signals.', "You have a track record of high-quality software development, and experience working directly with clients, whether external or internal. You have taken an active role in documentation and process development. You thrive in an environment where the long-term goals remain stable but day-to-day needs may change quickly. You are able to work with a diverse range of people, you are committed to continual learning, and you value sharing your knowledge with the team. Our team is distributed across the world, so we're looking for strong communicators who are self-motivated and able to work both collaboratively and independently.", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Automate infrastructure.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Meet with clients to discuss their needs.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Write user documentation.', 'About You', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Meet with members of the platform engineering team to discuss existing technologies and devise new technologies to solve client problems.', 'Location: We have a fully remote and distributed team and have been that way for over 5 years - CEO sits in NYC', 'You may never experience a "typical" day, but on any given day you will do some of these things:', '\xa0', "It's also an advantage if they have experience with data engineering, big data, and/or productionizing ML pipelines.\xa0If you have production experience with C/C++, Rust, Erlang, or Go, there is probably a greater chance they'll be able to quickly get up to speed with Rust and Pony.\xa0", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Implement client solutions in Pony, Rust, and Python.', 'A “Typical” Day']

['', 'Demonstrated knowledge of network programming models. General understanding of multiple techniques and toolkits is needed.', 'SALARY RANGE: $103,200 - $163,200 (SS III)', 'Ability to traverse across various locations on the laboratory site and access work areas\xa0Ability to work at a computer workstation for extended periods\xa0Visual capabilities to use computer workstations, read documents, and see safety alarms\xa0', 'Lead and assist in the design and development of data transport and related systems to support the 12 GeV program , EIC design work, and future science programs.', 'Ability to understand complex problems and to collaborate, explore and implement alternative solutions\xa0', 'Jefferson Lab seeks a new team member at the level of a Staff Computer Scientist III for the Experimental Physics Software and Computing Infrastructure (EPSCI) group in the Computational Science and Technology (CST) division. As a member of EPSCI, the candidate will help develop systems utilizing the latest software, computing, and networking technologies to help advance the scientific program of the lab. We are seeking excellent candidates with knowledge/experience in streaming data transport to design and implement systems to meet the challenges of future scientific experiments to match computational resources to their larger size and scope. These include the 12GeV Experimental Nuclear Physics program currently underway and future science programs under development. The successful candidate will focus on research activities and developing data transport tools for streaming readout data acquisition systems as well as post-acquisition data processing. Duties will include working with scientists at Jefferson Lab and partner institutions to develop such tools and provide expert advice on their implementation. Applicants must be able to work with a small group of subject matter experts, have good communication skills, and relevant technical knowledge.', 'Strong background in Linear Algebra, Probability and Statistics, Data Structure and Algorithms. Proficient in Python and C/C++.', 'Demonstrated knowledge of network programming models. General understanding of multiple techniques and toolkits is needed.Strong background in Linear Algebra, Probability and Statistics, Data Structure and Algorithms. Proficient in Python and C/C++.Must possess good written and oral communication skills.Must be able to operate computer equipment in an office or laboratory environment.', 'Plan, coordinate, and complete large projects.\xa0Learn the scientific requirements for the 12 GeV program, including experimental applications with an emphasis on data acquisition transport technologies.Lead and assist in the design and development of data transport and related systems to support the 12 GeV program , EIC design work, and future science programs.Collaborate with universities and other DOE Labs to advance and support the scientific program at Jefferson Lab.Experience in HTC preferred.\xa0Proficiency in C/C++, Java, and Python are a plus.', 'Ability to work at a computer workstation for extended periods\xa0', 'Education and Experience:', 'Knowledge, Skills, Abilities:', 'Physical Requirements', 'Jefferson Science Associates, LLC (JSA) manages and operates the Thomas Jefferson National Accelerator Facility (Jefferson Lab). JSA is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate in hiring or employment on the basis of race, color, religion, ethnicity, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, age, disability, or veteran status or on any other basis prohibited by federal, state, or local law. As part of the JSA’s equal employment opportunity policy, we also take affirmative action as called for by applicable laws and Executive Orders to ensure that minority group individuals, females, disabled veterans, recently separated veterans, other protected veterans, Armed Forces, and qualified disabled persons are introduced into our workforce and considered for promotional opportunities.', 'Capable of analytic and deductive reasoning\xa0', 'Experience in HTC preferred.\xa0Proficiency in C/C++, Java, and Python are a plus.', 'Employment with JSA is conditional upon DOE approval if at any time during your employment you are participating in a Foreign Government Talent Recruitment Program. Generally, such programs include any foreign-state-sponsored attempt to acquire U.S.-funded scientific research through programs run or funded by the government that target scientists, engineers, academics, researchers, and entrepreneurs of all nationalities working or educated in the United States.', 'Mental Requirements', 'We are currently seeking a Streaming Data Scientist..\xa0', 'Collaborate with universities and other DOE Labs to advance and support the scientific program at Jefferson Lab.', 'Must possess good written and oral communication skills.', 'Ability to traverse across various locations on the laboratory site and access work areas\xa0', 'Position Requirements', 'Visual capabilities to use computer workstations, read documents, and see safety alarms\xa0', "You 'Matter to Us'\xa0Our diverse team at Jefferson Lab includes more than 700 people, comprising physicists, engineers, computer professionals, technicians and more. From probing the basic building blocks of matter to performing advanced computing and applied research, we are on the leading edge of science and technology. If you are looking for a great job in a unique place where your contributions truly matter, consider Jefferson Lab!", '\xa0', 'Ph.D. in Computer Science or Physical Sciences plus 10 years of relevant experience', 'Must be able to operate computer equipment in an office or laboratory environment.', 'Ability to understand, remember, and communicate highly technical information and make decisions\xa0', 'Ability to understand, remember, and communicate highly technical information and make decisions\xa0Ability to understand complex problems and to collaborate, explore and implement alternative solutions\xa0Capable of analytic and deductive reasoning\xa0', 'POSITION POSTED: AUGUST 11, 2020', 'Essential Job Functions:\xa0', 'Plan, coordinate, and complete large projects.', '\xa0Learn the scientific requirements for the 12 GeV program, including experimental applications with an emphasis on data acquisition transport technologies.']

['·        Communicate value, negotiate trade-offs, and manage risks with senior management, stakeholders, and other product teams.', '·        Understanding of DevOps concepts.', 'Job Description', '·        Manage a Client Management Product Portfolio with an annual budget that ranges from $15M - $25M based on management investment allocation. ', '·        Comfort and experience interacting in person with customers.', '·        Proficient in the creation and presentation of business cases to senior management.', 'Notice to External Search Firms: Freddie Mac partners with BountyJobs for contingency search business through outside firms. Resumes received outside the BountyJobs system will be considered unsolicited and Freddie Mac will not be obligated to pay a placement fee. If interested in learning more, please visit www.BountyJobs.com and register with our referral code: MAC.', '·        Enable the success of the product/program teams by removing barriers and obstacles the teams may face', '·        High level of comfort operating in the gray, and flexibility to navigate competing priorities.', '·        Provide Freddie Mac customers the ability to request to do business with Freddie Mac and perform annual certifications, create and manage their employee access to Freddie Mac tools, provide direct feedback to Freddie Mac, and execute seller/servicer terms of business.  These capabilities will also allow Freddie Mac to manage our counterparty risks, to track customer feedback and provide insights to other product teams, and to manage the deal and contract management process for Freddie Mac. These capabilities are expressed through several tools, such as UCount, Salesforce, Freddie Mac Access Manager, and the Deal and Contract management platform.  These capabilities are critical to providing customers self service capabilities while also allowing Freddie Mac superb client management capabilities.', '·        Work with other Portfolio and Offering teams to coordinate any dependencies and/or go to market activities across portfolios', '·        Understanding of mortgage or loan initiation and servicing a plus', 'Do you have passion for understanding customer needs and leveraging technology to deliver value?  Do you thrive in a fast-paced and rapidly changing environment?  Do you enjoy working with a team of varying skillsets to collectively discover new opportunities to delight customers? If so, a role on the Single-Family Product Development team could be a fit for you.', '·        Ensure program/product teams have necessary access and visibility into customer needs and feedback regarding their products', 'Qualifications:', 'Today, Freddie Mac makes home possible for one in four home borrowers and is one of the largest sources of financing for multifamily housing. Join our smart, creative and dedicated team and you’ll do important work for the housing finance system and make a difference in the lives of others.', '·        Lead Program sync meeting of Chief Product Owners, Product owners and business sponsors to ensure continuous alignment of product scope across the program', '·        Regularly meet with customers and customer facing business partners to probe for value and seek feedback on ideas and prototypes for new features', '·        Challenger mindset and passion to challenge the status quo to find new solutions and drive outside the box', '·        Understand the business strategy and synchronize roadmaps and priorities across the related Agile release trains to ensure cohesive value to both the customer and Freddie Mac.', '·        High level of comfort operating in the gray, and flexibility to navigate competing priorities', '·        15+ years of related experience with demonstrated experience in product management and 8+ years of management experience', 'The Portfolio Product Owner will be part of the Strategic Delivery division within the Single-Family line of business, Freddie Mac’s largest line of business. Specifically, this role will guide the product management of customer facing products in the client management area. ', '·        Engage with CX and Strategy teams to brainstorm and prototype new concepts to prove value to the customer, and/or Freddie Mac, prior to adding work to any product backlogs', '·        Coordinate Program/Product Increment planning across the portfolio, determining if sprint planning is necessary across the portfolio/solution train', '·        Ability to influence strategy, negotiate trade-offs, and sell a compelling vision to stakeholders and business sponsors', 'Keys to Success In This Role', '·        Experience delivering large, complex change management projects that involve interfacing with multiple teams, especially projects involving changes to business applications and technology.', 'At Freddie Mac, you will do important work to build a better housing finance system and you’ll be part of a team helping to make homeownership and rental housing more accessible and affordable across the nation. ', '·        Ability to influence strategy, negotiate trade-offs, and sell a compelling vision to stakeholders and business sponsors.', '·        Ensure all change management practices from a data, process, and risks/controls are fully understood and executed by the product teams', '·        Certifications in Prosci or similar people change management methodology, human centered design approach highly desired.', '·        Work with business sponsors and key stakeholders to define and set the vision for a Portfolio of agile product teams.  As the Solution Train Owner for the Portfolio, they must understand market/customer needs as well as strategic organizational goals to ensure that the portfolio of product teams are optimizing the flow of work to deliver the most value for Freddie Mac and our customers in the most efficient fashion.', 'The Strategic Delivery division within the Single-Family line of business, Freddie Mac’s largest line of business. Our team and this role specifically, will guide the product management of customer facing products in the client management area. ', '·        Understanding the needs of customers and their operational processes to identify, design and define solutions that can be effectively implemented to deliver value. Leverage data & analytics to identify and communicate the value of proposed ideas and approach for implementing. Interact with customers and internal customer-facing staff to obtain feedback on solutions and design to validate and refine value, or pivot to something new.', '·        Work with Chief Product Owners, Product Owners, and business sponsors to develop and maintain product team constructs, adjusting capacity across the portfolio based on customer needs and business priorities', '·        Demonstrated ability to understand customer needs and deliver related value.', '·        Experience working in the Agile methodology', '·        Seek and use data and feedback to enhance customer outcomes.', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status or any other characteristic protected by applicable law. We will ensure that individuals with differing abilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.', 'Lead a team of chief product owners tasked with driving a vision for their products and guiding their teams to execute against the prioritized product backlog.', '·        Top notch written and verbal communication skills, able to effectively present to senior management and expertly facilitate meetings.', '·        Foster the collaboration of cross-organizational teams to establish, develop, implement and rollout new and enhanced capabilities.', '·        Strong analytical and problem-solving thought processes.', '·        Facilitate definition of product vision and roadmap in conjunction with business sponsors and senior management.', '·        Set and execute upon a clear vision, strategy and/or goals.', '·        Develop and communicate the product vision and roadmap for a collection of related Agile release trains operating in the same value stream, in partnership with business sponsors and senior management.', '·        Partner with Chief Product Owners, Product Owners, business sponsors, and key stakeholders on program level trade-offs', '·        Strong knowledge of client management concepts, industry trends and customer needs', '·        Some travel required (up to 5% of the time)', '·        Prior experience managing product teams.', '·        Work with Solution Train Engineer and Solution Chief Development Lead to identify and prioritize technical enabler work for the portfolio', '·        Build trust and strong partnerships through my own and my team’s actions.', '·        Proven change agent, comfortable leveraging data and customer insights to challenge the status quo', 'Current Freddie Mac employees please apply through the internal career site.']

job_title: Software Engineer II, Front End, Zoro
job_text: ['', 'As you are developing, testing should be at the forefront of your mind. We use Jasmine to test our JavaScript code.', 'For our databases, we heavily rely on Elasticsearch, MySQL, and Redis. We have a couple other platforms in use throughout our applications.', 'We expect a strong understanding of JavaScript ES5 and ES6 as well as Webpack and Docker. A large chunk of our application is written in Vue so ideally you’re well antiquated with the framework. ', 'Company Overview', 'Familiarity with multiple frameworks from languages and domains', 'Good grasp of design patterns and anti-patterns', 'We expect a strong understanding of JavaScript ES5 and ES6 as well as Webpack and Docker. A large chunk of our application is written in Vue so ideally you’re well antiquated with the framework. As you are developing, testing should be at the forefront of your mind. We use Jasmine to test our JavaScript code.HTML & CSS are the core building blocks for any front-end developer and it’s no different here. We use templating engines such as Dust.For our databases, we heavily rely on Elasticsearch, MySQL, and Redis. We have a couple other platforms in use throughout our applications.Our cloud platform is currently AWS but are transitioning to GCP. It’s important to understand the tools and services offered by a cloud service provider in order to choose the best option for your application.Git push origin source-controlAre there others? Yes. Is our stack fun? Yes. Will you get to work on what interests you? Yes. Should you apply? Yes.', 'Our cloud platform is currently AWS but are transitioning to GCP. It’s important to understand the tools and services offered by a cloud service provider in order to choose the best option for your application.', '2-4 years experience as a software engineer', 'Degree in Computer Science, a related technical or scientific field, or equivalent experience2-4 years experience as a software engineerFamiliarity with continuous integration and build toolsMastery of one programming language and working knowledge of at least one otherFamiliarity with multiple frameworks from languages and domainsUnderstanding of multiple programming paradigmsGood grasp of design patterns and anti-patterns', 'Familiarity with continuous integration and build tools', 'Git push origin source-control', 'Final Note', 'Mastery of one programming language and working knowledge of at least one other', 'HTML & CSS are the core building blocks for any front-end developer and it’s no different here. We use templating engines such as Dust.', 'Degree in Computer Science, a related technical or scientific field, or equivalent experience', 'Are there others? Yes. Is our stack fun? Yes. Will you get to work on what interests you? Yes. Should you apply? Yes.', 'Technologies We Use', 'Position Description', 'Understanding of multiple programming paradigms', 'Requirements']

['', 'Experience delivering software in a Scrum development process as well as ability to work within an existing sales process.', ' Qualifications ', 'Experience pulling, analyzing and visualizing data using Python and Jupyter Notebooks', 'Job Description ', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.", "Experience pulling, analyzing and visualizing data using Python and Jupyter NotebooksExperience building and extending React Redux ComponentsExperience delivering software in a Scrum development process as well as ability to work within an existing sales process.Experience working on AWS with Associated Solutions Architect or higher competency is preffered additional experience with Kubernetes, Azure and GCP as a plus.Ability to deliver tested, maintainable and bug-free Javascript & Python code in a continuous deployment environment.Strong verbal and written communication skills. Ability to write/create educational and support material for both technical and non-technical users.Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.What does Reserved.ai do?Reserved.ai was built by a team of ex-AWS data-scientists & enterprise AWS customers with the express goal of helping businesses automate and optimize AWS financial management.Average Reserved.ai customers save 38% off their AWS bill in just a few days and cut down wasted AWS billing administration time in IT & finance teams by 4 hours each per week.The product provides a set of state of the art automated cost optimization and AWS spend attribution tools, ideal for customers who have many internal teams on AWS, EDP commitments or are looking at ways to efficiently consume AWSwithout needing to invest in significant engineering or data science work.Where is Reserved.ai hiring this role?Our team has a headquarters in Seattle with a presence in The Pacific Northwest, Bay Area and Boston. We are open to hiring remote, or in our existing satellites, however the preference for this role is in our Seattle or Vancouver HQ.We are looking to make a long term investment in a engineer, with a “get-stuff-done” mentality and who can work closely with our founding team to grow with our business.Our culture is shaped by a commitment to our Core Principles:Our Mission is to Save Cloud Customers Time and Money. We have 7 key principles of conduct we live every day to help us achieve this mission:Get a referral bonus for the great people you know! With our amazing referral program, you could be eligible to win outstanding rewards for referring qualified new hires to Reserved.ai!Reserved.ai Inc. is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law", 'Experience working on AWS with Associated Solutions Architect or higher competency is preffered additional experience with Kubernetes, Azure and GCP as a plus.', 'We are seeking an experienced full-stack engineer with strong Python, React & AWS knowledge,', 'We are seeking an experienced full-stack engineer with strong Python, React & AWS knowledge,This position will engage directly with AWS APIs to build functional analysis reports and interactive web components.This position will involve implementation and measurement of features on top of our Python data platform and within our frontend React application (frontend data-visualization experience is a big plus).The ideal candidate is comfortable in technical and business requirements meetings and conversations, and self-motivated to pursue continuous improvement in a rapidly scaling environment supporting important customer missions.', 'This position will involve implementation and measurement of features on top of our Python data platform and within our frontend React application (frontend data-visualization experience is a big plus).', 'This position will engage directly with AWS APIs to build functional analysis reports and interactive web components.', 'The ideal candidate is comfortable in technical and business requirements meetings and conversations, and self-motivated to pursue continuous improvement in a rapidly scaling environment supporting important customer missions.', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills. Ability to write/create educational and support material for both technical and non-technical users.', 'Ability to deliver tested, maintainable and bug-free Javascript & Python code in a continuous deployment environment.', 'Redux Components', 'Experience building and extending React ']

job_title: Lead Software Engineer, Customer Data Portal
job_text: ['', ' Lead developer on full-stack web applications', ' Focus on major areas of work, typically 20% or more of role', ' Collaborate with data engineers on best practices and technical concepts of building large scale data platforms to allow marketing professionals to deploy best-in-class marketing campaigns.', ' Collaborate with Marketing Technology Product Managers to create scalable and user-friendly solutions for the Customer Data Portal.', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Job Summary', ' Coach other developers on best practices & quality thru code review & instruction', 'Responsibilities', ' Focus on major areas of work, typically 20% or more of role Lead developer on full-stack web applications Coach other developers on best practices & quality thru code review & instruction Collaborate with data engineers on best practices and technical concepts of building large scale data platforms to allow marketing professionals to deploy best-in-class marketing campaigns. Collaborate with Marketing Technology Product Managers to create scalable and user-friendly solutions for the Customer Data Portal.']

', 'Our Leadership Journeyman (LJ) program series help us groom future leaders for LTI through different levels of leadership in the organization, in a 5-days workshop. ', 'What we offer:', 'How will you grow? job_title: Senior Software Engineer: Medical and Imaging Devices
job_text: ['', 'Interfacing with the internal manufacturing team.', 'Signal and Image processing algorithm implementation in C++.', 'Hardware control and interface in the Linux environment on a single board computer. Hardware elements including high-speed cameras, displays, general purpose input/output, wi-fi and others.', 'good team player, with positive outlook and collaborative nature', 'The position falls under the technical growth ladder. The candidate demonstrating appropriate performance and skills shall proceed as follows with increasing level of responsibility.', 'Excellent coding and programming skills, and strong problem-solving capability.', 'We are looking for a software engineer to join our team and lead the efforts related to development of TOMi Scope software that interfaces different hardware peripherals, performs high-speed signal/image processing, extracts information using machine learning and provides a user-friendly interface for the medical setting.', 'Job Function', 'Qualifications', 'OMi ', 'Maintaining appropriate requirements, design, verification and validation documentation as required by FDA and ISO 13485 standards.', 'Excellent coding and programming skills, and strong problem-solving capability.Strong background in C++ programming.Experience with Linux operating system and application development on ARM-based single board computers.Preferred experience developing applications using QT.Preferred experience with Medical Device software development and related processes.Preferred experience with JavaScript.Expected to be a good team player, with positive outlook and collaborative nature.', 'The company operates with a philosophy of providing a fun, exciting and collaborative work environment for all team members. PhotoniCare also makes dedicated efforts towards professional and personal growth of all its team.', 'Growth Potential', 'QML based user interface.', 'Each promotion step is expected in a period of 12-18 months on demonstration of commensurate performance.', 'Scope software with help of external and internal technical team.QML based user interface.Hardware control and interface in the Linux environment on a single board computer. Hardware elements including high-speed cameras, displays, general purpose input/output, wi-fi and others.Signal and Image processing algorithm implementation in C++.Machine learning algorithm implementation in C++.Interfacing with the external software consultants.Interfacing with the internal manufacturing team.Maintaining appropriate requirements, design, verification and validation documentation as required by FDA and ISO 13485 standards.', 'PhotoniCare is a fast-growing VC funded MedTech company with a mission to improve health outcomes using cutting edge technology. We have developed the first FDA-cleared OCT-based imaging system, TOMi Scope, for assisting diagnosis of ear infections, a condition that affects 80% of children.', 'SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEER OR SOFTWARE ENGINEER: MEDICAL AND IMAGING DEVICES', 'TOMi', 'Experience with Linux operating system and application development on ARM-based single board computers.', 'Scope software with help of external and internal technical team.', 'Machine learning algorithm implementation in C++.', 'Preferred experience with Medical Device software development and related processes.', 'Interfacing with the external software consultants.', 'Preferred experience developing applications using QT.', 'Software Engineer --> Senior Software Engineer --> Senior Software Engineer II --> Manager/Principal Engineer', 'Strong background in C++ programming.', 'Maintaining all stacks of TOMi Software', 'Expected to be a good team player, with positive outlook and collaborative nature.', 'Preferred experience with JavaScript.']

The person will be characterized by a strong presence, self-motivation,\xa0analytical\xa0and critical thinking.\xa0\xa0', 'Strong written, oral and presentations skills with demonstrated experience communicating information to executive management, prospects, clients and public groups\xa0', 'National and international travel.\xa0\xa0', 'Familiar with Python, R or Spark\xa0', 'Experience with personal lines and commercial lines\xa0', '\xa0', 'Able to function in a complex, agile, fast-moving workplace and adapt to the changing environment.\xa0', 'The Actuarial Data Scientist helps lead multiple projects simultaneously. On a typical assignment, the actuary would be responsible for:\xa0', 'Provide operational analytics support to client delivery teams\xa0', 'Associate or Fellow of the Casualty Actuarial Society\xa0', 'Continuously supporting the Account Managers (Customer Success Managers) in their interaction with the Clients when actuarial questions are asked\xa0', "Participating as a subject matter expert with prospective clients.\xa0This includes, but is not limited to presenting Octo's analytical products and capabilities and responding to RFPs\xa0\xa0Creating collateral regarding analytical products to support Sales and Marketing teams\xa0Speaking to external audience at industry and Octo events to drive broader brand awareness.\xa0\xa0\xa0Participating on new client projects ensuring optimal implementation of analytics-based products\xa0\xa0Continuously supporting the Account Managers (Customer Success Managers) in their interaction with the Clients when actuarial questions are asked\xa0Delivering updates to clients on their scores and analytics, including managing the standard reporting process\xa0Assisting with the development of required filing support and responding to questions posed by regulators during the DOI approval process\xa0\xa0Proposing, defining and supporting research on new analytics ideas to increase and maximize the value added of Octo’s services for our Clients\xa0Supporting with the analysis and evaluation of new analytics ideas and defining business requirements\xa0\xa0Contribute to the evolutionary development of algorithms to assess motor insurance risk and deliver feedback to drivers and insurance companies\xa0Research alternative statistical modelling methodologies\xa0Prototype new product features in conjunction with the product development team\xa0Provide operational analytics support to client delivery teams\xa0Build relationships internally and collaborate effectively on cross-functional teams\xa0Working with the analytics team to define and research answers to internal and external questions and requests\xa0Other relevant Actuary activities as required\xa0"]

job_title: Staff Software Engineer, R&D, Digital Orthopedic Surgery
job_text: ['', 'Architect software tools to collect and transmit device telemetry for machine learning for reliability and product improvement.', 'Job Description', 'Experience in bringing medical devices to market through the 510(k) submission processVersed in GUI application development with C++ and QtStrong capabilities with a common scripting language like PowerShell, bash, or PythonAgile software development experience and familiarity with Agile development practices will contribute to your eligibilityIt is strongly preferred that you have experience working in a highly regulated environment, medical devices in particular.', 'Experience in bringing medical devices to market through the 510(k) submission process', "A minimum of a bachelor's degree is required. A major in Computer Science or similar is preferred.A minimum of 6 years of experience in technology and software development is required.Proven experience in technology and software development is required.Proficiency in the C# programming language and .Net development is required.You must have a desire to direct team compliance with IEC 62304 regulation in the creation of technical design, unit test, and code review documentation.Ability to contribute to the design and implementation of an application layer security scheme is required.Proficiency with Windows software application development is required.An understanding of both the Windows and Linux operating systems at a low-level is required.A good understanding of relational and NoSQL databases and handling data of various lineages and formats are required.", 'Collaborate with software engineers, product development engineers, cybersecurity and quality professionals, systems engineering, and product owners to build foundational components of our surgical platformArchitect software tools to collect and transmit device telemetry for machine learning for reliability and product improvement.Lead the design of a FHIR/HL7 implementation for clinical evidence generation and surgical dashboards.Develop user-facing Windows applications for device administration and servicing, user management, and surgical functionalityWorking with Test Engineers to devise testing strategies and scenarios on which to build test casesWrite design descriptions and architectural documentation in compliance with regulation our Quality Management SystemEnable next-generation data management and IoT capabilities for our surgical robotics platform', 'You must have a desire to direct team compliance with IEC 62304 regulation in the creation of technical design, unit test, and code review documentation.', 'Preferred:', 'Qualifications', "A minimum of a bachelor's degree is required. A major in Computer Science or similar is preferred.", 'Develop user-facing Windows applications for device administration and servicing, user management, and surgical functionality', 'Lead the design of a FHIR/HL7 implementation for clinical evidence generation and surgical dashboards.', 'Collaborate with software engineers, product development engineers, cybersecurity and quality professionals, systems engineering, and product owners to build foundational components of our surgical platform', 'This position is located in Boston, MA and may require up to 20% travel.', 'Other:', 'Working with Test Engineers to devise testing strategies and scenarios on which to build test cases', 'Enable next-generation data management and IoT capabilities for our surgical robotics platform', 'Proven experience in technology and software development is required.', 'It is strongly preferred that you have experience working in a highly regulated environment, medical devices in particular.', 'A minimum of 6 years of experience in technology and software development is required.', 'A good understanding of relational and NoSQL databases and handling data of various lineages and formats are required.', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Versed in GUI application development with C++ and Qt', 'Strong capabilities with a common scripting language like PowerShell, bash, or Python', 'Agile software development experience and familiarity with Agile development practices will contribute to your eligibility', 'Write design descriptions and architectural documentation in compliance with regulation our Quality Management System', 'Proficiency in the C# programming language and .Net development is required.', 'Proficiency with Windows software application development is required.', 'Ability to contribute to the design and implementation of an application layer security scheme is required.', 'An understanding of both the Windows and Linux operating systems at a low-level is required.']

['', 'Research and push new technologies like Kubernetes to make Match better.', 'You bring 1+ yrs. of React experience, preferably at scale.', 'Learn more about why our employees love working at Match!', 'Why Match Group?', 'Collaborate with engineers, UI designers and product managers.', 'Participate in paired programming and software code reviews to ensure flawless execution.', 'We adhere to an agile / Kanban methodology.', 'Make disciplined use of source control and bug tracking systems.', 'You have a willingness to grow your skills and those around you.', 'You’ll join a large dev team, full of bright and collaborative individuals.', 'Build full stack sites with C# in .NET Core, Gatsby, GraphQL, Postgres, and MS SQL.', 'Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability and general reliability.', 'Here’s your mission, should you choose to accept it:', "We value diversity at our company and will never discriminate based on someone's race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.", 'Design, build and polish intuitive and engaging experiences using React.', 'What’s the team like?', 'Our product is continuously evolving so every day you will have a chance to be challenged in new and interesting ways!', 'You’re a full stack dev with a propensity for UI and React.', 'We could be a match if:', 'You have experience with C# and SQL via web or API dev for public facing sites.']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Systems and Platform
job_text: ['', ' Integrate newer networking, systems drivers and packages as needed for any platform or cloud', 'Job Description', ' Design and implement systems and platforms features such as full-disk encryption, automatic failover of FortiSIEM nodes in High Availability environments Make FortiSIEM available on newer cloud platforms – Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud, Oracle Cloud, etc. in addition to maintaining current platforms such as Hardware, VMWare, HyperV, AWS, KVM, etc. Build a new paid AWS Marketplace offering for FortiSIEM, and maintain BYOL offerings for new releases Implement AWS Cloud formation templates for FortiSIEM cluster deployment in AWS Improve automated cluster deployment of FortiSIEM nodes in large scale environments, including auto-scale up and down of cluster Perform system level profiling of FortiSIEM in large-scale environments and make improvements (e.g. via tools such as OProfile/SystemTap/sysdig/Linux Dtrace) Investigate how to make FortiSIEM available on containers such as Docker and Kubernetes Migrate FortiSIEM application from CentOS6 to CentOS7 or another recent distribution due to EOL reasons as well as system performance via newer Linux kernel Integrate newer networking, systems drivers and packages as needed for any platform or cloud Deliver top quality, well organized and algorithmically sound code on time Work closely with other developers, QA, PM, and support. job_title: Software Engineer, Full Stack (Ruby on Rails)
job_text: ['', 'You’re product-minded, user-focused, and detail-oriented.You can work well in a small, cross-functional team, and communicate effectively with different business functions. You’re also able to work independently and make decisions with minimal supervision.You love to experiment and solve problems. You’re happy to question assumptions and to back your recommendations with well-formulated, data-driven analysis.You’re empathetic toward our users and your teammates. We’ve worked hard to create an inclusive and supportive team culture, and we’re excited to keep improving it.You welcome feedback and are always looking to learn and grow.', 'Experience with mobile development, particularly in React Native', 'Job Description', 'Experience in at least one modern JavaScript framework (we use React)', 'Company Description', 'Additional InformationNo agency submissions\xa0Turnitin, LLC is committed to the policy that all persons have equal access to its programs, facilities and employment without regard to race, color, ancestry, national origin, age, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, religion, creed, disability, medical condition, genetic information, marital or veterans status.', 'Familiarity with using Docker and AWS in development and deployment contexts', 'Experience with mobile development, particularly in React NativeExperience with data processing or analysisExperience writing unit and integration testsFamiliarity with using Docker and AWS in development and deployment contexts', 'Experience writing unit and integration tests', 'Work with our product and support teams, as well as directly with our customers, to understand users’ needs', 'You love to experiment and solve problems. You’re happy to question assumptions and to back your recommendations with well-formulated, data-driven analysis.', 'Build new features and improve existing features on the Gradescope assessment platformWork with our product and support teams, as well as directly with our customers, to understand users’ needsOwn the full software development lifecycle from design to releaseBreak down high-level projects into user stories and deliverablesWrite readable, testable, maintainable code', 'You’re product-minded, user-focused, and detail-oriented.', 'Qualifications', 'Additional Information', 'You can work well in a small, cross-functional team, and communicate effectively with different business functions. You’re also able to work independently and make decisions with minimal supervision.', 'At least two years of professional software development experience in Ruby on RailsExperience in at least one modern JavaScript framework (we use React)Production experience with relational databases and SQL (we use PostgreSQL)Experience using distributed source control platforms (we use git and GitHub)Demonstrated ability to collaborate cross-functionally', 'Break down high-level projects into user stories and deliverables', 'Experience with data processing or analysis', 'Company Description Turnitin is a global SaaS company dedicated to ensuring the integrity of education and research and supporting the development of original thinking skills. As the academic and research landscape evolves, Turnitin stays ahead of trends through advancements in technology and deep partnerships with education leaders, institutions, and practitioners.\xa0Turnitin’s content databases — built over 20 years — provide an unparalleled repository of 1+ billion student papers, best-in-class scholarly content from top publishers in every major discipline and in dozens of languages, and 70+ billion current and archived web pages. We promote honesty, consistency, and fairness across all assignment types and subject areas so that educators can help students do their best, original work.\xa0\xa0 ', 'You’re empathetic toward our users and your teammates. We’ve worked hard to create an inclusive and supportive team culture, and we’re excited to keep improving it.', 'Job DescriptionTurnitin is looking for an experienced full-stack software engineer to help us expand and scale the Gradescope assessment platform. This is a high-impact role in which you’ll collaborate cross-functionally with the Engineering, Product, and Quality Assurance, and Support teams to implement end-to-end solutions for Gradescope’s rapidly growing user base.\xa0We’re a small, collaborative engineering team who are passionate about improving assessment in higher education. We care deeply about our users and work proactively to make and keep them happy. We iterate often and wear multiple hats, always striving to deliver new value for our users. We take pride in building reliable, high-quality software that provides an intuitive and delightful user experience.Gradescope is an online assessment platform that enables instructors to grade everything in one place, including paper-based exams, online homework, and programming projects. We use cutting-edge technology and features like flexible auto graders and AI-assisted answer grouping to make grading faster and more equitable. Gradescope was founded in 2014 at UC-Berkeley and joined Turnitin via an acquisition in October 2018.What you’ll do:', 'QualificationsWho we’re looking for:\xa0', 'You welcome feedback and are always looking to learn and grow.', 'Build new features and improve existing features on the Gradescope assessment platform', 'At least two years of professional software development experience in Ruby on Rails', 'Own the full software development lifecycle from design to release', 'Demonstrated ability to collaborate cross-functionally', 'Production experience with relational databases and SQL (we use PostgreSQL)', 'Experience using distributed source control platforms (we use git and GitHub)', 'Write readable, testable, maintainable code']

['• Interact with product and business stakeholders beyond engineering.', 'Senior Software Engineer (Data) - Platform', 'We are looking for a talented Senior Software Engineer (Data) to join our Solution Delivery team. The ideal candidate should have an advanced grasp of the software engineering lifecycle and is particularly strong in backend development. You will join a team that works on collecting, storing, processing, and analyzing huge sets of data. The primary focus will be on choosing optimal solutions to use for these purposes, then maintaining, implementing, and monitoring them. You will also be responsible for integrating them with the architecture used across teams in our group.', '• Experience with testing frameworks and code quality tools', '', '• Environment management/orchestration systems (Kubernetes, etc.)', '• Familiar with the Hadoop ecosystem (HDFS, HBase, etc.), especially Spark.', '• Familiarity with Git', 'Summary of Duties & Job Description', '• Experience with agile development practices', 'Description', 'Skills and Qualifications', 'Role Desirables', '• Experience with security and authentication in cloud platforms (Azure preferred).', '• Proficient understanding and tech-lead level experience in one or more programming languages (Java, JavaScript, Python, etc.).', '• Diagnose system performance issues and advise any necessary infrastructure changes.', '• Knowledge of various ETL techniques.', '• Understanding Data Catalog, Data Governance, Data Lineage.', '• Knowledge of JIRA and Confluence', '• Experience with Oracle, PostgresSQL, Mongo development and optimization', '• Lead and guide project team(s) as a tech lead or key contributor.', '• API design and development', '• Bachelors Degree or above in a technical field (Computer Science preferred).', '• Knowledge of various persistence (RDBMS, NoSQL, HDFS, Cassandra, Redis).', '• 5+ years of experience in software development and/or data engineering.', 'Duration: 6+ Months', '• Evaluate and integrate tools and frameworks required to provide requested capabilities.', '• Experience with building data lakes and data warehouses is highly desirable.', '• Experience with JSON, RESTful web services, and client-server interactions.', '• Familiarity with Healthcare (FHIR), Clinical or Financial industry', 'Responsibilities', 'The Senior Software Engineer (Data) codes software applications based on business requirements. The Senior Software Engineer (Data) work assignments involve moderately complex to complex issues where the analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation of variable factors.', '• Mentor and develop junior levels of engineers.', '• Experience with continuous integration environment and tools', '• Knowledge of and experience with Azure.', 'Location: Louisville, KY or Dallas, TX', '• Good understanding of operating systems and networking.', 'Role: Hadoop Data Engineer', '• Experience with integration of data from multiple data sources', '• Knowledge of messaging systems, such as Kafka or RabbitMQ', '• Experience with Spring/Spring Boot', '• Experience with building stream-processing systems, using solutions such as Spark-Streaming or Flink.', '• Participate in architectural discussion and product development.', '• Experience with highly scalable web services', '• Good knowledge of Big Data querying tools.']

['', 'We are looking for a computational biologist or software engineer with a sustained track record of success in developing and maintaining large-scale software applications to address complex scientific data challenges.This position requires a Ph.D. or Master’s degree with 4+ years of relevant experience in the computer sciences, bioinformatics, or a scientific field of study such as Biology, Chemistry, or Biochemistry. Exceptional candidates without an advanced degree but with a demonstrated history of equivalent relevant experience are encouraged to apply.A working knowledge of both Python and R, with a mastery of either or both languages, is required.Knowledge of containerization, RESTful web service development and relational database design are highly desired; familiarity with PHP is a plus.Experience developing scientific algorithms, with basic biological concepts, research laboratory data and familiarity with the analysis of proteomic data are highly desired.Familiarity with modern software engineering best practices, including iterative/agile development, scientific software development lifecycles, version control, troubleshooting and testing is a must, as is the ability to make project decisions independently.Experience in and knowledge of semantic web concepts, including ontologies and data modeling, is a plus.', 'Research Informatics COMPANY/DIVISION', 'JOB TYPE', 'Who We Are', 'Knowledge of containerization, RESTful web service development and relational database design are highly desired; familiarity with PHP is a plus.', 'SCHEDULE', 'This position requires a Ph.D. or Master’s degree with 4+ years of relevant experience in the computer sciences, bioinformatics, or a scientific field of study such as Biology, Chemistry, or Biochemistry. Exceptional candidates without an advanced degree but with a demonstrated history of equivalent relevant experience are encouraged to apply.', 'A working knowledge of both Python and R, with a mastery of either or both languages, is required.', 'Job Facts', 'Experience developing scientific algorithms, with basic biological concepts, research laboratory data and familiarity with the analysis of proteomic data are highly desired.', 'Familiarity with modern software engineering best practices, including iterative/agile development, scientific software development lifecycles, version control, troubleshooting and testing is a must, as is the ability to make project decisions independently.', 'Experience in and knowledge of semantic web concepts, including ontologies and data modeling, is a plus.', 'The Position', 'We are looking for a computational biologist or software engineer with a sustained track record of success in developing and maintaining large-scale software applications to address complex scientific data challenges.', 'JOB FUNCTION']
